S06bsu049_u:5: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ,

S06bsu049_u:7_1: te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā
S06bsu049_u:8_0: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat - kimayamāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira ātmīyena

S06bsu049_u:21: tathāgatadharmadeśanāyā eva āyuṣman śāriputra eṣa niṣyandaḥ yatte kulaputrā upadiśantastāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na virodhayanti //
S06bsu049_u:22_1: - pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā
S06bsu049_u:25: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaduta bodhisattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:26: tamapyahaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yaduta prajñāpāramitā nāma /
S06bsu049_u:27: so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ vā bodhisattvadharmaṃ vā avindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan,
S06bsu049_u:28: prajñāpāramitāmapyavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06bsu049_u:29: api tu khalu punarbhagavan sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:37: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvayatā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā asau śikṣyamāṇastenāpi bodhicittena na manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:40: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?
S06bsu049_u:41: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā acittatā,
S06bsu049_u:42: tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
S06bsu049_u:44: subhūtirāha - sacedāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:45: api nu te yukta eṣa paryanuyogo bhavati yadāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha - asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti?
S06bsu049_u:46: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kā punareṣā āyuṣman subhūte acittatā?
S06bsu049_u:47: subhūtirāha - avikārā āyuṣman śāriputra avikalpā acittatā //
S06bsu049_u:48: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhvāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:49: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi /
S06bsu049_u:51: avirahitaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:52: śrāvakabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva [Vaidya_4] prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:54: pratyekabuddhabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:56: bodhisattvabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:59: ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabodhisattvadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:61: anuttarāyām api samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:64: ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabuddha dharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:66: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo 'haṃ bhagavan etadeva bodhisattvanāmadheyaṃ na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:67: prajñāpāramitām api na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:68_1: prajñāpāramitām api avindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ
S06bsu049_u:70: yo 'haṃ vastvavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇa āyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:71: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam /
S06bsu049_u:73: evaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam /
S06bsu049_u:74: sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:78: adhimucyate 'dhyāśayena avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:81: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06bsu049_u:83: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacedrūpe tiṣṭhati, rūpābhisaṃskāre carati, na carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:85: sacedvijñāne tiṣṭhati, vijñānābhisaṃskāre carati, na carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:87: na hi abhisaṃskāre caran prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:90: aparipūrayamāṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyati [Vaidya_5] sarvajñatāyāmaparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhṇan /
S06bsu049_u:91: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi aparigṛhītaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:98: evaṃ hyatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
S06bsu049_u:99: ayaṃ ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāparigṛhīto nāma samādhirvipulaḥ puraskṛtaḥ apramāṇaniyato 'sādhāraṇaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:100: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sāpi sarvajñatā aparigṛhītā, na hi nimittato grahītavyā /
S06bsu049_u:101: sacennimittato grahītavyā abhaviṣyat, na ceha śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ śraddhāmalapsyata /
S06bsu049_u:102: tatra hi śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ sarvajñajñāne adhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:104: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:117: so 'tra sarvatra śraddhānusārī sarvajñajñāne dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya evamadhimukta iti /
S06bsu049_u:119: nāpi sa kaściddharmo ya upalabdhaḥ, yaṃ gṛhṇīyānmuñcedvā /
S06bsu049_u:121: iyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā yadrūpaṃ na parigṛhṇīte /
S06bsu049_u:126: tasmādiyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā //
S06bsu049_u:127: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evamupaparīkṣitavyamevamupanidhyātavyam - katamaiṣā prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu049_u:129: kiṃ yo dharmo na vidyate nopalabhyate, sā prajñāpāramiteti?
S06bsu049_u:130: sacedevamupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ evamupanidhyāyan nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:135: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:137: evaṃ yadā vedanaiva saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva,
S06bsu049_u:141: [Vaidya_6] evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - etametadāyuṣman śāriputra evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:151: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:153: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evametadāyuṣman śāriputra, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:154: yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate, sa niryāsyati sarvajñatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:155: tatkasya hetoḥ? ajātā hyanirjātā hyāyuṣman śāriputra sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:156: evaṃ carata āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatā āsannībhavati /
S06bsu049_u:160: evaṃ ca punarāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvajñatāyā āsannībhavati //
S06bsu049_u:161: punaraparamāyuṣmān subhūtirbodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamārabhyaivamāha - sacedrūpe carati, nimitte carati /
S06bsu049_u:169: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti carati, nimitte carati /
S06bsu049_u:170: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati /
S06bsu049_u:173: sacedvijñānanimitte carati, nimitte carati sacedvijñānaṃ nimittamiti carati, nimitte carati /
S06bsu049_u:179: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti carati, nimitte carati /
S06bsu049_u:180: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati /
S06bsu049_u:186: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathaṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06bsu049_u:187: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
S06bsu049_u:196: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:212: carāmi ca na carāmi ceti nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:213: naiva carāmi na na carāmīti nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:216: cariṣyāmi ca na cariṣyāmi ceti nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:221: anenaiva samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate //
S06bsu049_u:222: buddhānubhāvena āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha - vyākṛto 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:224: sa tam api samādhiṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:225: na ca tena samādhinā manyate - ahaṃ samāhitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:230: evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate //
S06bsu049_u:231_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamenāyuṣman subhūte
S06bsu049_u:234: tatkasya hetoḥ? tam api hi sa kulaputraḥ samādhiṃ na jānāti, na saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:235: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman subhūte vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:236: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman śāriputra vadāmi /
S06bsu049_u:238: avidyamānatvena tasya samādhestaṃ samādhiṃ na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:239: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:241: yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvena te pratibhāti, tathāgatādhiṣṭhānenopadiśasi /
S06bsu049_u:243: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate //
S06bsu049_u:244: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo [Vaidya_8] mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate?
S06bsu049_u:245: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate //
S06bsu049_u:246: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ katamasmin dharme śikṣate?
S06bsu049_u:247: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:249: na hi te śāriputra dharmāstathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā aśrutavanto 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:250: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - kathaṃ tarhi te bhagavan saṃvidyante?
S06bsu049_u:251: bhagavānāha - yathā śāriputra na saṃvidyante, tathā saṃvidyante evamavidyamānāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:255: te tān kalpayitvā dvayorantayoḥ saktāḥ tān dharmānna jānanti na paśyanti /
S06bsu049_u:257: kalpayitvā dvāvantāvabhiniviśante abhiniviśya tannidānamupalambhaṃ niśritya atītān dharmān kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:259: pratyutpannān dharmān kalpayanti te kalpayitvā nāmarūpe 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:261: te tānasaṃvidyamānān sarvadharmān kalpayanto yathābhūtaṃ mārgaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti /
S06bsu049_u:262: yathābhūtaṃ mārgamajānanto 'paśyanto na niryānti traidhātukāt, na budhyante bhūtakoṭim /
S06bsu049_u:263: tena te bālā iti saṃjñāṃ gacchanti /
S06bsu049_u:265: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśante //
S06bsu049_u:266: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate?
S06bsu049_u:267: bhagavānāha - evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyām api na śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:268: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:269: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:272: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan evaṃ paripṛcchet - kimayaṃ māyāpuruṣāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:275: tasya bhagavan evaṃ paripṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt?
S06bsu049_u:276: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tena hi subhūte tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:279: bhagavānetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte anyā sā māyā,
S06bsu049_u:281: anyā sā māyā, anyā sā vedanā /
S06bsu049_u:282: anyā sā saṃjñā, anye te saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:283: anyā sā māyā, anyattadvijñānam? subhūtirāha - na hyetadbhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:284: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadrūpam /
S06bsu049_u:286: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyā sā vedanā, anyā sā saṃjñā anye te saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:287: vedanā saṃjñā [Vaidya_9] saṃskārā eva bhagavan māyā, māyaiva vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:288: na bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadvijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:290: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte atraiṣāṃ saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu yaduta bodhisattva iti?
S06bsu049_u:292: tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇeva śikṣitavyaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:293: tatkasya hetoḥ? sa eva hi bhagavan māyāpuruṣo dhārayitavyo yaduta pañcopādānaskandhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:294: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ rūpamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:295: yacca rūpaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:296: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā uktāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:297: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ vijñānamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:298: yacca vijñānaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:299: mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:300: bhagavānāha - yadi subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pāpamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:302: atha cetsubhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:304: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni?
S06bsu049_u:305: bhagavānāha - ya enaṃ pāramitāsu avavadanti anuśāsati /
S06bsu049_u:310: imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:311_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - imāni subhūte
S06bsu049_u:312: yacca bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti bhagavannucyate, tatra bodhisattva iti bhagavan kaḥ padārtha?
S06bsu049_u:313: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - apadārthaḥ subhūte bodhisattvapadārthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:314: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saktatāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:315: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nubodhanārthena asaktatāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:316: bodhyarthena tu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
S06bsu049_u:318: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate?
S06bsu049_u:319: bhagavānāha - mahataḥ sattvarāśermahataḥ sattvanikāyasya agratāṃ kārayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:321: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - mamāpi bhagavan pratibhātiyenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
S06bsu049_u:322: bhagavānāha - pratibhātu te śāriputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
S06bsu049_u:323: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - mahatyā ātmadṛṣṭyāḥ sattvadṛṣṭyāḥ jīvadṛṣṭyāḥ pudgaladṛṣṭyāḥ [Vaidya_10] bhavadṛṣṭyāḥ vibhavadṛṣṭyāḥ ucchedadṛṣṭyāḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭyāḥ svakāyadṛṣṭyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:326: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
S06bsu049_u:327: bhagavānāha - pratibhātu te subhūte yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
S06bsu049_u:329: yad api tadbhagavan bodhicittaṃ sarvajñatācittamanāsravaṃ cittamasamaṃ cittaṃ asamasamaṃ cittamasādhāraṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:335: tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
S06bsu049_u:336: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:337: subhūtirāha - acittatvādāyuṣman śāriputra tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:338: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?
S06bsu049_u:339: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
S06bsu049_u:341: subhūtirāha - tadyadi āyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:342: tatkathamāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha - asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti?
S06bsu049_u:343: śāriputra āha - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:344: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi //
S06bsu049_u:345: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
S06bsu049_u:348: tasmātsa mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
S06bsu049_u:349: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃnaddha iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
S06bsu049_u:350: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho bhavati ?
S06bsu049_u:351: bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - aprameyā mayā sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:353: na ca te santi yairye parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:355: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:356: tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatāmupādāya syāt /
S06bsu049_u:357: yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākaro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyamabhinirmimīte /
S06bsu049_u:359: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tatra kenacitkaściddhato vā mṛto vā nāśito vā antarhito vā?
S06bsu049_u:361: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bodhisattvo [Vaidya_11] mahāsattvo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayati /
S06bsu049_u:362: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:363: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśamevaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ śrutvā notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:364: iyatā ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho veditavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:365: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu049_u:366: tathā asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:369: tatkasya hetoḥ? akṛtā hi subhūte sarvajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā /
S06bsu049_u:370: te 'pi sattvā akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ, yeṣāṃ sattvānāmarthāya ayaṃ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:372: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpamabaddhamamuktam /
S06bsu049_u:378: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - rūpamāyuṣman subhūte abaddhamamuktamiti vadasi /
S06bsu049_u:381: rūpatathatāpi āyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amukteti vadasi /
S06bsu049_u:384: atha katamattadāyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yadrūpamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:385: evaṃ katamā sā vedanā, katamā sā saṃjñā, katame te saṃskārāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:387: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte rūpatathatā yā rūpatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:388: evaṃ katamā sā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā?
S06bsu049_u:389: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte vijñānatathatā yā vijñānatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:390: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputrametadavocat - yadāyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam /
S06bsu049_u:391: evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya vedanā, yā māyāpuruṣasya saṃjñā, ye māyāpuruṣasya saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:393: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
S06bsu049_u:394: evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā /
S06bsu049_u:395: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya vijñānatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
S06bsu049_u:397: asadbhūtatvādabaddhā amuktā, viviktatvādabaddhā amuktā, anutpannatvādabaddhā amuktā /
S06bsu049_u:398: ayaṃ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya mahāsaṃnāho 'saṃnāhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:400: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo [Vaidya_12] mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ san mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:407: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāyānamiti subhūte aprameyatāyā etadadhivacanam /
S06bsu049_u:409: yad api subhūte evaṃ vadasi - kathaṃ vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:418: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niryāsyati, api tu khalu punarna kutaścinniryāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:422: nāpi kaścittena mahāyānena niryāto nāpi niryāsyati nāpi niryāti /
S06bsu049_u:423: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaś ca niryāyāt, yena ca niryāyāt, ubhāvetau dharmau na vidyete nopalabhyete /
S06bsu049_u:424: evamavidyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati?
S06bsu049_u:425: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:426: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāyānaṃ mahāyānamiti bhagavannucyate /
S06bsu049_u:429: evameva bhagavan asmin yāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:430: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāyānamidaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
S06bsu049_u:431: naivāsyāgamo dṛśyate, naivāsya nirgamo dṛśyate, nāpyasya sthānaṃ saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:432: evamasya bhagavan mahāyānasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:437: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:440: atra śikṣitvā bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvajñatā anuprāptā, anuprāpsyate anuprāpyate ca //
S06bsu049_u:441: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānamupadeṣṭavyaṃ manyate /
S06bsu049_u:442: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - nāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānamavocam /
S06bsu049_u:446: api nu khalu punarbhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:450: rūpāparyantatayā hi bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā, evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:455: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti nopaiti, idam api na vidyate nopalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:456: evaṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvadharmamanupalabhamāno nāhaṃ bhagavan taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasyaitannāmadheyaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:459: so 'haṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ taṃ dharmamanupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ dharmaṃ katamena dharmeṇa katamasmin dharme 'vavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06bsu049_u:464: yathā ātmā ātmeti ca bhagavannucyate, atyantatayā ca bhagavannanabhinirvṛtta ātmā /
S06bsu049_u:468: evameteṣāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yā asvabhāvatā, sā anabhinirvṛttiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:471: na cānyatra bhagavan anabhinirvṛttitaḥ sarvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā upalabhyante,
S06bsu049_u:473: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ deśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:474: nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:475: evaṃ veditavyam - caratyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:480: yasmin hi samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imān dharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyupaparīkṣate,
S06bsu049_u:485: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:490: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /
S06bsu049_u:495: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:496: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam, yo vijñānasyāvyayo na tadvijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:500: evaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti,
S06bsu049_u:504: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:509: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /
S06bsu049_u:514: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:515: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam, yo vijñānasyāvyayo na tadvijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:519: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tena hi yathāhamāyuṣmataḥ subhūterbhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu049_u:521: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ kiṃ bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati?
S06bsu049_u:522: yāni vā tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhānyutsahate pratyanubhavitum?
S06bsu049_u:523_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra
S06bsu049_u:523_1: icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantam nāpi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06bsu049_u:525: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā śakyo 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kartum /
S06bsu049_u:527: sarvasattvānāmantike mātṛsaṃjñāṃ pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā strīpuruṣeṣu /
S06bsu049_u:528: evametāḥ saṃjñāḥ kṛtvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /
S06bsu049_u:529: tasmānmātṛsaṃjñā pitṛsaṃjñā putrasaṃjñā duhitṛsaṃjñā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike yāvadātmasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:530: yathā ātmā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:531: evaṃ sarvasattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:532: evaṃ ca sarvasattveṣu saṃjñā utpādayitavyā - mayaite sarvasattvā na parityaktavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:534: na ca mayaiteṣu cittapradoṣa utpādayitavya antaśaḥ śataśo 'pi chidyamāneneti /
S06bsu049_u:535: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittamutpādayitavyam sacedevaṃcitto vihariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:538: punaraparamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - yathā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvamātmā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:539: evaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /
S06bsu049_u:541: sacedevaṃcittaścariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī cariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī vihariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:542: yadapyāyuṣman śāriputra evamāha - anutpādo bodhisattvo iti /
S06bsu049_u:545: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattva evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:547: subhūtirāha - bodhisattvadharmā api āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvadharmā evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:553: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte sarvajñatādharmā evānutpādaḥ, utāho pṛthagjano 'pyanutpādaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:555: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte pṛthagjana evānutpādaḥ, utāho pṛthagjanadharmā apyanutpādaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:557: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:563: nanvāyuṣman subhūte anuprāptaiva ayatnena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvajñatā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:564: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptimicchāmi, nāpyabhisamayam /
S06bsu049_u:566: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,
S06bsu049_u:567: utāho utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate?
S06bsu049_u:568: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anutpanno dharma utpannaḥ, utāho anutpanna eva dharmo 'nutpannaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:569: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte utpāda eva dharmo 'nutpādaḥ, utāho anutpādo dharma utpādaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:570: āha - utpādo dharmo 'nutpādo dharma ityāyuṣman śāriputra na pratibhāti jalpitum /
S06bsu049_u:571: āha - anutpādo 'pi te āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti jalpitum /
S06bsu049_u:576: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - dhārmakathikānāmāyuṣmān subhūtiragratāyāṃ sthāpitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:578: tathā hyāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyate,
S06bsu049_u:582: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāmaniśritadharmāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:588: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:592: iti hi yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmevaṃ deśyamānāyāmevamupadiśyamānāyāṃ na bhavati cittasya avalīnatvam,
S06bsu049_u:596: veditavyamayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti // [Vaidya_16]
S06bsu049_u:597: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:599: yadi hyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:601: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:603: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte manasikāreṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:605: evaṃ sati sarvasattvā apyavirahitā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:606: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvasattvā api hyavirahitā manasikāreṇa viharanti //
S06bsu049_u:607: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra /
S06bsu049_u:609: artha eva tvāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:610: tatkasya hetoḥ? sattvāsvabhāvatayā āyuṣman śāriputra manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:616: anena āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃrūpeṇa manasikāreṇa icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ viharantamanena vihāreṇeti //
S06bsu049_u:621: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt catvāriṃśatā trāyastriṃśatkāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
S06bsu049_u:622: catvāraś ca lokapālā viṃśatyā cāturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
S06bsu049_u:624: pañca ca śuddhāvāsānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇānyabhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:627_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - imānyārya
S06bsu049_u:627_1: subhūte saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi asyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇāni āryasya
S06bsu049_u:631: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi te buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā buddhādhiṣṭhānena /
S06bsu049_u:633: ye tvavakrāntāḥ samyaktvaniyāmam, na te bhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
S06bsu049_u:634: tatkasya hetoḥ? baddhasīmāno hi te saṃsārasrotasaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:635: abhavyā hi te punaḥ punaḥ saṃsaraṇāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
S06bsu049_u:637: sacette 'pyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayeran, nāhaṃ kuśalamūlasyāntarāyaṃ karomi /
S06bsu049_u:638: viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ //
S06bsu049_u:639: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu049_u:642: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kṛtajñairasmābhirbhagavan bhagavato bhavitavyaṃ nākṛtajñaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:644: paurvakāṇāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike 'smadarthe bhagavān yathā brahmacaryaṃ bodhāya caran pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva san,
S06bsu049_u:647: evaṃ bhagavan asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigrahītavyā anuparivārayitavyāśca,
S06bsu049_u:650: asmābhir api hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītā anuparivāritāśca,
S06bsu049_u:652: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - tena hi kauśika śṛṇu,
S06bsu049_u:653: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06bsu049_u:654: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:655: śūnyatāyāṃ kauśika tiṣṭhatā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:656: tena hi kauśika [Vaidya_18] bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:658: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:666: na śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmeṣu, na śrotravijñāne, yāvanna manovijñāne /
S06bsu049_u:667: na manaḥsaṃsparśe, na manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:669: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, nākāśadhātau, na vijñānadhātau sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:673: na sakṛdāgāmiphale, na anāgāmiphale, nārhattve sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:677: iti hi vedaneti, saṃjñeti, saṃskārā iti /
S06bsu049_u:679: iti hi cakṣuriti, yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedaneti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:680: iti hi pṛthivīdhāturiti, yāvadvijñānadhāturiti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:682: iti hi samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānīti, iti hi mārgāṅgānīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:711: srotaāpannāḥ saptakṛto bhavaparamā iti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:713: sakṛdāgāmyapariniṣṭhitattvātsakṛdimaṃ lokamāgamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:714: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam anāgāmī anāgamya imaṃ lokaṃ tatraiva parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:716: arhannihaiva anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:718: pratyekabuddho 'tikramya śrāvakabhūmimaprāpya buddhabhūmiṃ parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:720_3: buddhabhūmau sthitvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena
S06bsu049_u:721_0: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat - yadi buddho 'tikramya pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya
S06bsu049_u:721_4: buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvāsyati
S06bsu049_u:724_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
S06bsu049_u:724_1: āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra kva tathāgato
S06bsu049_u:725: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - na kvacidāyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:726: tatkasya heto? apratiṣṭhitamānaso hi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:727: sa naiva saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāpyasaṃskṛte dhātau sthito na ca tato vyutthitaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:728: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evameva āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:729: evaṃ śikṣitavyam - yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kvacitsthito nāsthito na viṣṭhito nāviṣṭhitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:735: yathā tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti susthito 'sthānayogeneti evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyamevaṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:736: evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti //
S06bsu049_u:737: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhūt - yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabhāṣitāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni,
S06bsu049_u:739: na punaridaṃ vijñāyate yatsubhūtiḥ sthaviro bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayatyupadiśati /
S06bsu049_u:740_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva
S06bsu049_u:740_1: cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - na vijñāyate na vijñāyate idaṃ devaputrāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:741: tathā hi nātra kiṃcitsūcyate, nātra kiṃcit śrūyate //
S06bsu049_u:742: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ punarevaitadabhūt - uttānīkariṣyati bata ayamāryasubhūtiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:746_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena punar api teṣāmeva devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva
S06bsu049_u:746_1: cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate [Vaidya_20] sma - tena hi devaputrāḥ
S06bsu049_u:756: atha khalu punar api teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - kiṃrūpā asya āryasubhūterdhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:757_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
S06bsu049_u:757_1: tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - māyānirmitasadṛśā hi devaputrā mama dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:758: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te naiva śroṣyanti na ca sākṣātkariṣyanti //
S06bsu049_u:759: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - kiṃ punarārya subhūte māyopamāste sattvā na te māyā?
S06bsu049_u:760: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat - māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:762: iti hi māyā ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram,
S06bsu049_u:763: iti hi svapnaś ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:769: arhann api arhattvam api māyopamaṃ svapnopamam /
S06bsu049_u:774: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - samyaksaṃbuddho 'pyārya subhūte māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:776: subhūtirāha - nirvāṇam api devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi, kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmam /
S06bsu049_u:777: te devaputrā āhuḥ - nirvāṇamapyārya subhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:778: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - tadyadi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
S06bsu049_u:780: iti hi devaputrā māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:781: iti hi svapnaś ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram //
S06bsu049_u:787_0: anye ca mahāśrāvakā anekairbodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhamāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayante
S06bsu049_u:787_1: sma - ke 'syā āyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti?
S06bsu049_u:788: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastān sthavirānetadavocat - te khalvāyuṣmanto veditavyā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā [Vaidya_21] mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:791: ye 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti //
S06bsu049_u:792: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavirastān sthavirānetadavocat - nāsyā āyuṣmantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ kecitpratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:794: tathā hi - atra na kaściddharmaḥ sūcyate,
S06bsu049_u:800: tathaivāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyā na kaścitpratyeṣako bhaviṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:801: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - asya dharmaparyāyasya āryeṇa subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇasya pūjārthaṃ yannvahaṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āryaṃ subhūtimabhyavakireyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:802: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimabhyavākirat /
S06bsu049_u:803: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya śakraṃ devānāmindramanuvyāharaṇāyaitadabhūt - na khalu punarimāni puṣpāṇi mayā trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pracaranti dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:809: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataḥ subhūteścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - anirjātānyetānyārya subhūte puṣpāṇi /
S06bsu049_u:810: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi manonirjātāni kānicitpuṣpāṇi, nāpi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātāni /
S06bsu049_u:811: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yattvaṃ kauśika evaṃ vadasi - anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:815: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyamāryaḥ subhūtiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:816: tāṃ ca nāma padaprajñaptiṃ nirdiśati, tāṃ ca na virodhayati, tāṃ cottānīkaroti, tāmeva copadiśati /
S06bsu049_u:817: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametadārya subhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:818: evaṃ cātra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yathā āryasubhūtirupadiśati /
S06bsu049_u:819: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:821: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na srotaāpattiphale śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:827: yo nāsu bhūmiṣu śikṣate, sa buddhatve sarvajñatve vā śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:828: yo buddhatve sarvajñatve vā śikṣate, so 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:829: yo 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate, sa na rūpasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate, na parihāṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:830: evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:831: sa na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate, na parihāṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:832: yo na rūpasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:833: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:834: yo na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya, sa na rūpasya parigrahāya śikṣate notsargāya /
S06bsu049_u:835: [Vaidya_22] evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:842: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:844: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati //
S06bsu049_u:845: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:847: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:849: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmān subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:851: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evametadāyuṣman śāriputra, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:852: ya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:854: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:856: sarvabuddhadharmāṇām api na parigrahāya śikṣate, notpādāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:857: evaṃ cāyuṣman śāriputra śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:859: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - prajñāpāramitā ārya śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:860: śāriputra āha - prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ parivartādgaveṣitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:861: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kasyaiṣa ārya śāriputra anubhāvo veditavyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:863: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika anubhāvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:864: tathāgatasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate /
S06bsu049_u:865: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - kasyaiṣo 'nubhāvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:866: kasyaitadanuṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate iti?
S06bsu049_u:869: yad api kauśika evaṃ vadasi - prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyeti?
S06bsu049_u:870: prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpādgaveṣitavyā nāpyanyatra rūpādgaveṣitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:871: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārebhyaḥ na vijñānādgaveṣitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:873: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā, nāpyanyatra rūpātprajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:874: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:876: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāpāramiteyamārya subhūte yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:885: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpamahattayā hi kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:905: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu049_u:906: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi kauśika yato nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:908: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:910: na teṣāmanto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:912: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:914: vijñānasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:915: anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
S06bsu049_u:917: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sattvasyānto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vopalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:919: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu049_u:920: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - na hi kauśika gaṇanāyogena vā gaṇanābahutvena vā sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
S06bsu049_u:921: śakra āha - kathaṃ tarhīdānīmārya subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta [Vaidya_24] prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu049_u:922: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkaṃ manyase kauśika katamasyaitaddharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti?
S06bsu049_u:923: śakra āha - naitadārya subhūte dharmasyādhivacanaṃ na adharmādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:927: anārambaṇametannāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:928: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase kauśika kācidatra sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā?
S06bsu049_u:930: subhūtirāha - yatra kauśika na kācitsattvaparidīpanā kṛtā, tatra kā sattvānantatā?
S06bsu049_u:931: sacetkauśika tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nantavijñaptighoṣeṇa gambhīranirghoṣeṇa svareṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān api vitiṣṭhamānaḥ sattvaḥ sattva iti vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06bsu049_u:932: api nu tatra kaścitsattva utpanno va utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:933: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā?
S06bsu049_u:936: subhūtirāha - anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa evaṃ sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:937: evaṃ ca punaḥ kauśika sattvānantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā //
S06bsu049_u:938: atha khalu sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇāstrirudānamudānayanti sma - aho dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:942: sa āryeṇa subhūtinā sthavireṇa subhāṣiteneha sūcyate deśyate prakāśyate prabhāvyate /
S06bsu049_u:943: tathāgataṃ taṃ vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadyāgreṇa dhārayiṣyāmo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:944: yo 'pi ca anena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihariṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:945: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān sendrakān sabrahmakān saprajāpatikān sarṣinaranārīgaṇānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:946: yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyāmantarāyaṇamadhyagato 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito 'bhūvam,
S06bsu049_u:947_0: tadāhaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06bsu049_u:947_1: - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato
S06bsu049_u:947_3: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti /
S06bsu049_u:948: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan, paramāścaryaṃ sugata /
S06bsu049_u:949: yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñatāyā āhārikā anuparigrāhikā ceti //
S06bsu049_u:954: atha khalu bhagavān ye tatra devaputrāḥ parṣadi saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāścābhūvan,
S06bsu049_u:956: tān devaputrān saṃnipatitān saṃniṣaṇṇāṃś ca viditvā,
S06bsu049_u:957: tāś ca sarvāścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāś ca viditvā,
S06bsu049_u:958: kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān brahmakāyikāṃś ca devaputrān ābhāsvarāṃś ca parīttaśubhāṃś ca akaniṣṭhāṃś ca devaputrān sākṣiṇaḥ sthāpayitvā,
S06bsu049_u:959_0: śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān mahābrahmapramukhāṃś ca brahmakāyikān
S06bsu049_u:959_1: devaputrānābhāsvarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - yo hi kaściddevaputrāḥ kulaputro
S06bsu049_u:959_2: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:960: na tasya māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraprekṣiṇyo 'vatāragaveṣiṇyo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:961: nāpi tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:962: nāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:963: punaraparaṃ devaputrāḥ ye devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:964: yaiś ca devaputrairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā nodgṛhītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā na pravartitā,
S06bsu049_u:965: te devaputrāstaṃ kulaputra vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:966: tasya ca kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasyāntikācchroṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:967: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:968_0: na ca khalu punardevaputrāstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato
S06bsu049_u:968_1: dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasya araṇyagatasya vā vṛkṣamūlagatasya
S06bsu049_u:968_2: vā śūnyāgāragatasya vā abhyavakāśagatasya vā pathi gatasya vā utpathagatasya vā aṭavīgatasya
S06bsu049_u:968_3: vā mahāsamudragatasya vā tatra tatropasaṃkrāmato vā caṃkramyamāṇasya vā sthitasya
S06bsu049_u:968_4: vā niṣaṇṇasya vā vipannasya vā bhayaṃ vā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:970_0: atha khalu catvāro mahārājāno bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yadimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇan
S06bsu049_u:970_1: dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yānatraye sattvān vinayati,
S06bsu049_u:972: vayaṃ bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:973: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:974: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - aham api bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:975: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:976: brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmakāyikairdevaputrairbhagavantametadavocat - aham api bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:977: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:978_0: [Vaidya_26] atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan
S06bsu049_u:978_1: yadimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan sa kulaputro
S06bsu049_u:978_2: vā kuladuhitā vā imān yato dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān pratilabhate parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:979: kiṃ punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti?
S06bsu049_u:980: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:981: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kauśika udgṛhītāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:982: punaraparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ dhāritāyāṃ vācitāyāṃ paryavāptāyāṃ pravartitāyāṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti /
S06bsu049_u:983: tān kauśik sarvān śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te /
S06bsu049_u:984: sādhu bhagavanniti śakro devānāmindro bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S06bsu049_u:985: bhagavānetadavocat - tatra kauśika ye mama dharmaṃ vigrahītavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:988: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāmutpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:990: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:992_0: evaṃ hyetatkauśika bhavati - ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udgrahīṣyati
S06bsu049_u:992_1: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:994: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:995: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:996: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti pravartayati deśayati upadiśati uddiśati svādhyāyati /
S06bsu049_u:997: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika maghī nāmauṣadhī sarvaviṣapraśamanī /
S06bsu049_u:998: tatra āśīviṣeṇa jantunā bubhukṣitena āhārārthinā āhāragaveṣiṇā kaścideva prāṇakajāto janturdṛṣṭo bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:1000: atha sa prāṇakajāto yena sā madhī nāmauṣadhī tenopasaṃkramet, tenopasaṃkramya tiṣṭhet /
S06bsu049_u:1001: atha sa āśīviṣastasyā oṣadhyā gandhenaiva pratyudāvarteta /
S06bsu049_u:1003: tathā hi tasyā oṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇaḥ sa tādṛśo yastasyāśīviṣasya tadviṣamabhibhavati /
S06bsu049_u:1005_0: evameva kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
S06bsu049_u:1005_1: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:1006: tasya kauśika yāni tānyutpannotpannānyadhikaraṇāni vigrahā vivādā virodhā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:1007: te prajñāpāramitāyāstejasā balena sthāmataḥ prajñāpāramitābalādhānena kṣipraṃ tata evoparaṃsyanti upaśamiṣyanti antardhāsyanti na vivardhiṣyante /
S06bsu049_u:1011: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā hi rāgādīnāṃ yāvannirvāṇagrāhasyopaśamayitrī, na vivardhiketi /
S06bsu049_u:1012: catvāraś ca tasya mahārājānaḥ [Vaidya_27] śakraś ca devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāpatiḥ sarve ca buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś ca rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:1013: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyatiḥ uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:1014: ayaṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇaḥ parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:1015_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati
S06bsu049_u:1015_1: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:1027: sa nopanāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti, na vyāpādaṃ parigṛhṇāti, nānuśayaṃ dhārayati /
S06bsu049_u:1028: evaṃ carato 'sya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā smṛtirmaitrī cotpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:1036: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:1037: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:1038: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yatheyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paridamanāya pratyupasthitā anunāmāya bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām //
S06bsu049_u:1039_0: bhagavānāha - punaraparaṃ kauśika ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
S06bsu049_u:1039_1: vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati
S06bsu049_u:1040_0: sacetkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmevamudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan
S06bsu049_u:1040_1: paryavāpnuvan pravartayan deśayan upadiśayan uddiśan svādhyāyan saṃgrāme vartamāne
S06bsu049_u:1041_0: tasya saṃgrāmamavatarato vā avatīrṇasya vā atikrāmato vā saṃgrāmamadhyagatasya vā
S06bsu049_u:1041_1: tiṣṭhato vā niṣaṇṇasya vā asthānametatkauśika anavakāśo yattasya kulaputrasya vā
S06bsu049_u:1041_2: kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ manasi kurvato vā udgṛhṇato vā dhārayato vā vācayato
S06bsu049_u:1041_3: vā paryavāpnuvato vā pravartayato vā deśayato vā upadiśato vā uddiśato vā svādhyāyato
S06bsu049_u:1043: sacetpunastasya kaścitkauśika tatra śastraṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā anyadvā kṣipet,
S06bsu049_u:1045: tatkasya hetoḥ? mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:1052: atra hi kauśika [Vaidya_28] vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
S06bsu049_u:1055: atra hi kauśika vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06bsu049_u:1057: tena so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ cittāni vyavalokayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:1059: atra hi kauśika vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na tatkiṃcidasti,
S06bsu049_u:1060: yanna prāptaṃ vā na jñātaṃ vā na sākṣātkṛtaṃ vā syāt /
S06bsu049_u:1062: ayam api kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇaḥ parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:1063: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
S06bsu049_u:1064: punaraparaṃ kauśika yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā antaśo likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṃgamaṃ sthāpayitvā na satkariṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:1074: na tatra kauśika sattvānāṃ manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā avatārārthiko 'vatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam /
S06bsu049_u:1075: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti //

S06bsu049_u:2510: śakra āha - bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata /

S06bsu049_u:2514: yasteṣāmavinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kṣiprataramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,

S06bsu049_u:2521: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - yathā yathā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,

S06bsu049_u:2529: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kauśika yastvaṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmutsāhaṃ dadāsi anugṛhṇīṣe anuparivārayasi /

S06bsu049_u:2545_1: sma - yacca khalu punaḥ ārya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,

S06bsu049_u:2622: athāpi yathā vastu yathā ārambaṇaṃ yathā ākārastathā bodhistathā cittam,
S06bsu049_u:2624: yadi ca yathā vastu yathā ārambaṇaṃ yathā ākārastathā bodhistathā cittam,

S06bsu049_u:2627_1: - nedamārya subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyaṃ nopadeṣṭavyam /

S06bsu049_u:2638: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yena maitreya cittenānumodya yatpariṇāmayati,

S06bsu049_u:2644_1: subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ

S06bsu049_u:2647_6: ekaikasmiṃś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S06bsu049_u:2647_8: yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhitaḥ,

S06bsu049_u:2656: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣitā adhimuktāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ,

S06bsu049_u:2729: yenāpi cittena pariṇāmyate, tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā /
S06bsu049_u:2730: yair api dharmaiḥ pariṇāmyate, teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmatā /
S06bsu049_u:2731: yeṣv api dharmeṣu pariṇāmyate, teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmateti /
S06bsu049_u:2732: sacedevaṃ pariṇāmayati, samyakpariṇāmayati, na mithyā pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:2734_0: [Vaidya_74] punaraparamārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
S06bsu049_u:2734_2: trisāhasra mahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya
S06bsu049_u:2737: etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:2738: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2743: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:2744: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣante 'dhimokṣayanti pratitiṣṭhanti,
S06bsu049_u:2746: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:2748: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān vyākurvanti pratyekabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:2750: yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:2753: ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,
S06bsu049_u:2754: ye ca devānāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā vā taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti,
S06bsu049_u:2756: ye ca tiryagyonigatā api sattvāstaṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti,
S06bsu049_u:2758: ye ca teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāyatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,
S06bsu049_u:2760: tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumoditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:2761_0: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayato
S06bsu049_u:2761_1: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:2762: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati, tasmiṃścitte na cittasaṃjñī bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:2763: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati - yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti /
S06bsu049_u:2764: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:2765: atha yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati taccittaṃ saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:2766: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:2768: taccittamevaṃ saṃjānīte evaṃ samanvāharati - taccittaṃ samanvāhriyamāṇameva kṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇamityevaṃ saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:2771: yenāpi cittena pariṇāmyate, tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā /
S06bsu049_u:2772: yair api dharmaiḥ pariṇāmyate, teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ [Vaidya_75] saiva dharmatā /
S06bsu049_u:2773: yeṣv api dharmeṣu pariṇāmyate, teṣām api dharmāṇāṃ saiva dharmateti /
S06bsu049_u:2774: sacedevaṃ pariṇāmayati, samyakpariṇāmayati, na mithyā pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:2777: yāvacca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāḥ parinirvāsyanti parinirvānti ca,
S06bsu049_u:2778: yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca,
S06bsu049_u:2779: etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:2780: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2785: yaiś ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśito deśayiṣyate deśyate ca,
S06bsu049_u:2786: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca,
S06bsu049_u:2790: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:2792: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:2794: yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:2797: yaiś ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:2798: yaiś ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragairmanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca,
S06bsu049_u:2800: yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca,
S06bsu049_u:2802: yaiś ca sattvaisteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvṛteṣu parinirvāsyatsu parinirvāyatsu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:2804: tāni sarvāṇyakato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamagrayā anumodanayā anumodeta,
S06bsu049_u:2805: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta /
S06bsu049_u:2806: evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /
S06bsu049_u:2807: tasya kathaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:2808: sacetpariṇāmayan evaṃ samanvāharati - te dharmāḥ kṣīṇā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2809: sa ca dharmo 'kṣayo yatra pariṇāmyate ityevaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ [Vaidya_76] samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:2812: evaṃ bhadantaṃ subhūte pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:2813: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate /
S06bsu049_u:2814: sacetpunarevaṃ saṃjānīte - na cittaṃ cittaṃ jānāti,
S06bsu049_u:2818: sacetpunarbodhisattvastaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ saṃjānīte, na pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:2819: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāmabhiniviśate /
S06bsu049_u:2820: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - so 'pi puṇyābhisaṃskāro viviktaḥ śāntaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2821: yadapyanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tad api viviktaṃ śāntamiti pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:2822: sacedevam api na saṃjānīte - sarvasaṃskārāḥ śāntā viviktā iti,
S06bsu049_u:2823: evamiyaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad api tatteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kuśalamūlam /
S06bsu049_u:2825: yenāpi tatpariṇāmitaṃ tad api tajjātikaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ tannikāyaṃ tatsvabhāvam /
S06bsu049_u:2827: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi buddhā bhagavanto nimittayogena pariṇāmanāmabhyanujānanti /
S06bsu049_u:2831: yacca nopalabhyate tannaiva nimittaṃ na viṣayaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:2832: sacedevaṃ nimittīkaroti, na samanvāharati na pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:2833: atha smṛtivaikalyena na nimittīkaroti na samanvāharati na manasi karoti smṛtivaikalyādanavabodhādvā,
S06bsu049_u:2837: evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:2838: evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam - idaṃ tadbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:2839: yenopāyakauśalena kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati, sa āsannaḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:2840_0: atra copāyakauśalaṃ śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā
S06bsu049_u:2840_1: abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā
S06bsu049_u:2842: na hi prajñāpāramitāmanāgamya śakyeyamaśrutavatā prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmanākriyā praveṣṭum /
S06bsu049_u:2843: tatra ya evaṃ vadet - śakyamanāgamya prajñāpāramitāṃ tatpuṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumiti,
S06bsu049_u:2846: niruddhā hi te ātmabhāvāḥ, niruddhā hi te saṃskārāḥ, śāntā viviktā virahitā upalabdhinaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:2847: api tu khalu punaḥ sa pudgalo nimittīkṛtya vikalpya ca yathābhūtamayathābhūte yathābhūtasaṃjñī upalambhamanupalambhe pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:2848: tasya kuśalamūlaṃ buddhā bhagavanta evaṃ pariṇāmitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau nābhyanujānanti /
S06bsu049_u:2850: eṣa eva hi tasya [Vaidya_77] mahānupalambho bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:2851: yatsa parinirvāṇam api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nimittīkaroti vikalpayati ca /
S06bsu049_u:2853: na copalambhasaṃjñinastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāmanāṃ mahārthakarīṃ vadanti /
S06bsu049_u:2854: tatkasya hetoḥ? saviṣaḥ saśalyo hyeṣaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:2855: tadyathāpi nāma praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ saviṣaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:2856: kiṃ cāpi tadvarṇataś ca gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś ca abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:2857: api tu khalu punaḥ saviṣatvātparivarjanīyaṃ bhavati paṇḍitānām, na paribhogāya /
S06bsu049_u:2858: tadeva bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:2859: tasya tadbhojanaṃ paribhuñjānasya varṇatasya gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś ca svādeṣu sukhakaraṃ pariṇāme cāsya duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:2860: sa tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet, maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham /
S06bsu049_u:2861: evameva ārya subhūte ihaike durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena subhāṣitasyārthamajānānā yathābhūtamarthamanavabudhyamānā evamavavadiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:2862: evamanuśāsiṣyanti - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham /
S06bsu049_u:2863: teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ yaistatra teṣvatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:2864: yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca,
S06bsu049_u:2865_0: etasminnantare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca
S06bsu049_u:2865_1: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānām,
S06bsu049_u:2866: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:2867: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:2868: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:2869: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:2870: ye ca śrāvakayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca śrāvakabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:2871: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:2872_0: yāni ca pṛthagjanānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
S06bsu049_u:2872_1: bhagavatāṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā
S06bsu049_u:2872_2: niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:2873: evaṃ sa pariṇāmo nimittayogena pariṇāmyamāno viṣatvāya saṃpravartate,
S06bsu049_u:2882: kathaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06bsu049_u:2883_0: ihānena bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatamanabhyākhyātukāmena
S06bsu049_u:2883_1: evaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamanumoditavyamevaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te [Vaidya_78]
S06bsu049_u:2883_2: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā buddhajñānena buddhacakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti tatkuśalamūlaṃ
S06bsu049_u:2884: yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate tathā anumode tatkuśalamūlam,
S06bsu049_u:2885: yathā ca te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhyanujānanti pariṇāmyamānaṃ tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:2887: evamanumodamāna evaṃ pariṇāmayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'naparāddho bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:2888: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaktvānumoditaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ ca bhavati tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
S06bsu049_u:2890: evaṃ cāsya pariṇāmo nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati adhyāśayena adhimuktyā pariṇāmayataḥ //
S06bsu049_u:2891_0: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyam
S06bsu049_u:2891_1: - yacchīlaṃ yaḥ samādhiryā prajñā yā vimuktiryadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tadyathā aparyāpannaṃ
S06bsu049_u:2891_2: kāmadhātau aparyāpannaṃ rūpadhātau aparyāpannamārūpyadhātau nāpyatītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam /
S06bsu049_u:2894: yatrāpi dharme sa pariṇāmaḥ pariṇāmyate, so 'pi dharmo 'paryāpannaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:2896: evaṃ pariṇāmayatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinaṣṭaḥ pariṇāmo bhavatyaparyāpanno nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:2897: atha taṃ pariṇāmayati niviśate nimittīkaroti, mithyā pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:2899: anayā dharmadhātupariṇāmanayā yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti,
S06bsu049_u:2900: yathā cābhyanujānanti tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitamevaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatīti,
S06bsu049_u:2902: evaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
S06bsu049_u:2903: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:2904: śāstṛkṛtyaṃ tvaṃ subhūte karoṣi, yastvaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayasi /
S06bsu049_u:2905: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hyayaṃ subhūte pariṇāmaḥ, dharmadhātupariṇāmo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S06bsu049_u:2906: asyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti paśyanti,
S06bsu049_u:2907: tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate, tathā anumode /
S06bsu049_u:2909: atra yaḥ puṇyaskandho yaś ca gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2910: tān sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayetpratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:2912: tato 'yameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajaḥ puṇyaskandho 'gra ākhyāyate,
S06bsu049_u:2923: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu [Vaidya_79] karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,

S06bsu049_u:3348: na bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karoti - iyattasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:3349: dvitīyakam api tṛtīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ākhyātu me bhagavāṃstasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam /
S06bsu049_u:3350: paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatianena vāṅbhanaḥkarmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitenopacitenopacitena evaṃ mahāntaṃ mahānirayeṣvātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇīteti /
S06bsu049_u:3351: bhagavānāha - eṣa eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:3352: yadanena vāṅbhanoduścaritena akuśalena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena iyacciraduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti /

S06bsu049_u:3357: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - susaṃvṛtakāyakarmavākkarmamanaskarmaṇā bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bhavitavyam /

S06bsu049_u:3369: tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghe 'pi pratibādhite evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:3371: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko 'tra bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yatsa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate?

S06bsu049_u:3374: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ pāpābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyate /

S06bsu049_u:3412: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā subhūte rūpaviśuddhiḥ, sā phalaviśuddhiḥ, yā phalaviśuddhiḥ, sā rūpaviśuddhiḥ /

S06bsu049_u:3428: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /

S06bsu049_u:3450: vijñānaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte /

S06bsu049_u:3477: yatra hi nāma bhagavatā ime 'pi saṅgā ākhyātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3478: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katame te āyuṣman subhūte saṅgāḥ?

S06bsu049_u:3486: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamena ārya subhūte paryāyeṇa saṅgaḥ?

S06bsu049_u:3490_0: tasmāttarhi kauśika paraṃ saṃdarśayatā samādāpayatā samuttejayatā saṃpraharṣayatā
S06bsu049_u:3490_1: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhūtānugamena saṃdarśayitavyaṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ samuttejayitavyaṃ
S06bsu049_u:3492: buddhānujñātayā ca samādāpanayā paraṃ samādāpayati sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā /
S06bsu049_u:3494: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte,

S06bsu049_u:3499: bhagavānetadavocat - iha subhūte śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nimittato manasi karoti /

S06bsu049_u:3502_1: ityanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayati /

S06bsu049_u:3505: yā tryadhvanirmuktā, na sā śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ na nimittīkartuṃ nārambaṇīkartum /
S06bsu049_u:3515: yā ca subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiviviktatā, sā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3517: tathā hi subhūte akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3518: subhūtirāha - tasmāttarhi bhagavan sarvadharmā anabhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena?
S06bsu049_u:3519: bhagavānāha - tathāhi subhūte prakṛtyaiva na te dharmāḥ kiṃcit /
S06bsu049_u:3525: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte dve dharmaprakṛtī /
S06bsu049_u:3527: yā ca subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ, sā aprakṛtiḥ, yā ca aprakṛtiḥ, sā prakṛtiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3528: evametāḥ subhūte sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā bhavanti //
S06bsu049_u:3532: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:3534: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na cittena jñātavyā na cittagamanīyā /
S06bsu049_u:3537: āha - tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kathaṃ caritavyam?

S06bsu049_u:3545: sacedrūpaṃ śūnyamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3547: sacedvijñānaṃ śūnyamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3548: sacedrūpamapratipūrṇaṃ pratipūrṇamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3549: yā ca rūpasyāpratipūrṇatā pratipūrṇatā vā, na tadrūpam /
S06bsu049_u:3551: sacedvijñānamapratipūrṇaṃ pratipūrṇamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3552: yā ca vijñānasyāpratipūrṇatā pratipūrṇatā vā, na tadvijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:3553: sacedevam api na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām //
