S06bsu049_u:3555: bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti subhūte na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3557: vijñānaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti subhūte na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3558: cakṣuḥ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati, [Vaidya_97] carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3559: evaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3560: pṛthivīdhātuḥ sasaṅgo 'saṅga iti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3561: yāvadvijñānadhātuḥ sasaṅgo 'saṅga iti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3562: dānapāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3564: prajñāpāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3565: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sasaṅgāsaṅgā iti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:3567: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3568: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalamanāgāmiphalamarhattvaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3569: pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3570: buddhatvaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3571: sarvajñatāpi subhūte sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3572: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:3573: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:3580: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:3587: na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:3591: tatkasya hetoḥ? asaktā abaddhā amuktā asamatikrāntā hi subhūte sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:3592: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvasaṅgasamatikramāya bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam //
S06bsu049_u:3593: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan, yāvadgambhīro 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ prajñāpāramitā nāma /
S06bsu049_u:3594: yā deśyamānāpi na parihīyate, adeśyamānāpi na parihīyate /
S06bsu049_u:3597: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:3599: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhannākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06bsu049_u:3602: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣo bhāṣyamāṇe 'pi varṇe nānunīyate na saṃkliśyate,
S06bsu049_u:3603: abhāṣyamāṇe 'pi varṇe na pratihanyate, na saṃkliśyate /
S06bsu049_u:3604: evameva subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā, sā deśyamānāpi tāvatyeva, adeśyamānāpi tāvatyeva //
S06bsu049_u:3605: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na saṃsīdati notplavate /
S06bsu049_u:3606: atra ca nāma yogamāpadyate, na ca pratyudāvartate /
S06bsu049_u:3608: [Vaidya_98] namaskartavyāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, yairayaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3609: tatkasya hetoḥ? ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa bhagavan saṃnaddhukāmo yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ badhnāti /
S06bsu049_u:3611: śūro bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhukāmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3614: mahāvīryapāramitāsaṃnāhaprāptaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate //
S06bsu049_u:3615: atha khalvanyatamo bhikṣuryena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai /
S06bsu049_u:3616: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati, na kaṃciddharmaṃ nirodhayati //
S06bsu049_u:3617: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya ārya subhūte atra prajñāpāramitāyāmeva yogamāpatsyate,
S06bsu049_u:3619: subhūtirāha - ākāśe sa kauśika yogamāpatsyate, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyate /
S06bsu049_u:3620: abhyavakāśe sa kauśika yogamāpatsyate, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yogamāpattavyaṃ maṃsyate //
S06bsu049_u:3621: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - ājñāpayatu bhagavān /
S06bsu049_u:3622: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karomi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayati /
S06bsu049_u:3623: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyasi?
S06bsu049_u:3625: subhūtirāha - evaṃ kauśika sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:3628: lapsyante 'sya avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo manuṣyāś ca amanuṣyāś ca avatāram /
S06bsu049_u:3629: api ca kauśika ākāśasya sa rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
S06bsu049_u:3630: yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3631: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika pratibalastvaṃ pratiśrutkāyā rakṣāvaraṇagupti saṃvidhātum?
S06bsu049_u:3633: subhūtirāha - evameva kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran viharan pratiśrutkopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti parijānāti /
S06bsu049_u:3634: sa ca tānna manyate, na samanupaśyati, na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:3635: te ca dharmā na vidyante na saṃdṛśyante na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante iti viharati /
S06bsu049_u:3637: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro mahārājānaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3642: [Vaidya_99] upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'tiṣṭhan /
S06bsu049_u:3646: sahāpatiś ca mahābrahmā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhasahasraṃ samānvāharanti sma /
S06bsu049_u:3647: ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padairebhirevākṣaraiḥ subhūtināmadheyaireva bhikṣubhiriyameva prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭā,
S06bsu049_u:3649: tatrāpi śakrā eva devendrāḥ paripṛcchanti sma,
S06bsu049_u:3650: paripraśnayanti sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe iyameva prajñāpāramitā bhāṣitā /
S06bsu049_u:3651: maitreyo 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe enāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate iti //
S06bsu049_u:3656: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramiteti bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etat /
S06bsu049_u:3663_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
S06bsu049_u:3663_1: ebhireva nāmabhiḥ ebhireva padaiḥ ebhirevākṣaraiḥ asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate?
S06bsu049_u:3664: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tathā hi subhūte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ nityaṃ nānityaṃ na rūpaṃ baddhaṃ na muktam,
S06bsu049_u:3666: evaṃ nā vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:3667: na vijñānaṃ nityaṃ nānityam, na vijñānaṃ baddhaṃ na muktam, atyantaviśuddhamityabhisaṃbhotsyate /
S06bsu049_u:3668_0: anena subhūte kāraṇena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
S06bsu049_u:3668_1: ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padavyañjanairasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate //
S06bsu049_u:3669: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - pariśuddhā bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu049_u:3682: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - sulabdhā bata lābhāsteṣāṃ bhagavan kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca,
S06bsu049_u:3684: prāgeva ya udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:3685: na teṣāṃ cakṣūrogo bhaviṣyati, na śrotrarogo na ghrāṇarogo na jihvārogo na kāyarogo bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3686: na dhandhāyitatā bhaviṣyati, na te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:3687: bahūni caiṣāṃ devatāsahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:3688: aṣṭamīṃ caturdaśīṃ pañcadaśīṃ ca sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:3690: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:3691: bahūni subhūte tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā devatāsahasrāṇi [Vaidya_101] pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:3692: bahūni ca devatāsahasrāṇi tatrāgamiṣyanti sarvāṇi dharmaśravaṇārthikāni /
S06bsu049_u:3693: tāni ca rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇasya /
S06bsu049_u:3694: tatkasya hetoḥ? sadevamānuṣāsurasya hi subhūte lokasya prajñāpāramitā anuttaraṃ ratnam /
S06bsu049_u:3695: ato 'pi subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3696_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bahavo 'ntarāyā bhaviṣyanti asyā gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā
S06bsu049_u:3696_1: likhyamānāyā udgṛhyamāṇāyā dhāryamāṇāyā vācyamānāyāḥ paryavāpyamānāyāḥ pravartyamānāyā
S06bsu049_u:3697: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bahupratyarthikāni mahāratnāni bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:3699: anuttaraṃ cedaṃ subhūte mahāratnaṃ lokasya yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3705: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte sarve te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /
S06bsu049_u:3708: tathā hi subhūte rūpanirupalepatayā anupalipteyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3711: sacedevam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:3712: sā khalu punariyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasyāveśikā vā niveśikā vā saṃdarśikā vā nidarśikā vā āvāhikā vā nirvāhikā vā //
S06bsu049_u:3713: atha khalu saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi antarīkṣe kilakilāprakṣveḍitena cailavikṣepānakārṣuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3714: dvitīyaṃ batedaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ jambūdvīpe paśyāma iti cāvocan /
S06bsu049_u:3715: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - nedaṃ subhūte dvitīyaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ nāpi kasyaciddharmasya pravartanaṃ vā nivartanaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:3717: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavaṃstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06bsu049_u:3722: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi kaściddharmo ya upalabhyate, yo vā dharmaḥ sūcyate /
S06bsu049_u:3724: tatkasya hetoḥ? atyantānabhinirvṛttā hi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3726: tatkasya hetoḥ? ādyanabhinirvṛttā hi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ, prakṛtiviviktatvātsarvadharmāṇām //
S06bsu049_u:3727: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:3728: na hi subhūte śūnyatā pravartate vā nivartate vā /
S06bsu049_u:3729: nāpi subhūte ānimittaṃ pravartate vā nivartate vā /
S06bsu049_u:3730: nāpi subhūte apraṇihitaṃ pravartate vā nivartate vā /
S06bsu049_u:3731: yā subhūte evaṃ deśanā, iyaṃ sā sarvadharmāṇāṃ deśanā /
S06bsu049_u:3738: nāpyanayā dharmadeśanayā kaścitparinirvṛto nāpi parinirvāsyati nāpi parinirvāti /
S06bsu049_u:3740: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - asatpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan ākāśasattāmupādāya /
S06bsu049_u:3799: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3802: kaḥ punarvādo ya enāmevaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:3803: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:3806: na te avaramātrakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:3808: paripṛṣṭāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāśca te buddhā bhagavanto bhaviṣyanti kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiścaināmeva prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:3811: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3816: ya etasyāmeva gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante na saṃleṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:3821_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ caitasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
S06bsu049_u:3821_1: bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan ihaivaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
S06bsu049_u:3821_2: deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā abhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya
S06bsu049_u:3821_3: prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
S06bsu049_u:3826: tatkasya hetoḥ? gambhīrā bhagavan iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3827: na hi bhagavan parīttakuśalamūlenāparipṛcchakajātīyena aśrutvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ pūrvamacaritavatā ihaiveyamevaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā adhimoktuṃ śakyā /
S06bsu049_u:3829: pūrvāntato'pi bhagavaṃstaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā /
S06bsu049_u:3831: na hi bhagavan acaritavadbhiḥ pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śakyā adhimoktum /
S06bsu049_u:3832: ye'pi ca pratikṣepsyanti enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇām,
S06bsu049_u:3833: te'pyevaṃ veditavyāḥ - pūrvāntato'pyebhiriyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā /
S06bsu049_u:3834: tathā hyeṣāmasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāsti śraddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3835: nāsti kṣāntirnāsti rucirnāsti cchando nāsti vīryaṃ [Vaidya_105] nāstyapramādo nāstyadhimuktiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3836: na caibhiḥ pūrvaṃ buddhā bhagavanto buddhaśrāvakā vā paripṛṣṭāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3838: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - gambhīrā ārya śāriputra prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3839: kimatrāścaryaṃ syādyadasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pūrvamacaritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nādhimucyeta?
S06bsu049_u:3840: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai /
S06bsu049_u:3841: sarvajñajñānasya sa bhagavannamaskāraṃ karoti, yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyai namaskāraṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:3843: sarvajñajñānasya sa kauśika namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyai namaskāraṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:3844: tatkasya hetoḥ? atonirjātā hi kauśika buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:3850: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:3852: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kauśika /
S06bsu049_u:3853: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ kauśika yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamenamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase /
S06bsu049_u:3855: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe na tiṣṭhati, rūpamiti na tiṣṭhati /
S06bsu049_u:3856: yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:3860: vijñāne na tiṣṭhati, vijñānamiti na tiṣṭhati /
S06bsu049_u:3861: yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vijñāne na tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:3864: rūpamiti kauśika na yojayati, yataḥ kauśika rūpamiti na yojayati, evaṃ rūpamiti na tiṣṭhati /
S06bsu049_u:3871: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3877: yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ rūpe yogamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:3880: yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ vijñāne yogamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:3882: yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate, evaṃ rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati /
S06bsu049_u:3885: yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate, evaṃ vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati //
S06bsu049_u:3886: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā avinivartanīyasya vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:3887: tatkasya hetoḥ? sa hi bhagavan na kāṅkṣiṣyati, na vicikitsiṣyati na dhaṃdhāyiṣyati na vivadiṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:3888_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sacetpunarārya śāriputra
S06bsu049_u:3888_1: avyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purata iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyeta, ko doṣo bhavet?
S06bsu049_u:3889: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - dūrataḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3890: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlaḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3891: yo'vyākṛta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:3892: śrutvā ca notrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsamāpatsyate /
S06bsu049_u:3893: na cedānīmasau cireṇa vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3895: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo naikaṃ vā dvau vā trīn vā tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānatikramiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:3897: api tu tānārāgayiṣyati, ārāgayitvā tāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānna virāgayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3902: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - dūrataḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3904: paripakvakuśalamūlo hi bhagavan sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3905: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:3906: kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
S06bsu049_u:3907: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evametacchāriputra, evametat /
S06bsu049_u:3908: dūrataḥ sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3910: paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:3911: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:3912: kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
S06bsu049_u:3913: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - pratibhāti me bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:3915: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan yo'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svapnāntaragato'pi bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdet,
S06bsu049_u:3918: evameva bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:3919: kaḥ punarvādaḥ śrutvā codgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayituṃ deśayituṃ upadeṣṭuṃ uddeṣṭuṃ svādhyāpanāya /
S06bsu049_u:3922: vyākariṣyantyenaṃ buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:3923: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3925_0: kaḥ punarvādo'tra bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati
S06bsu049_u:3925_1: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:3927: bhūyastvena hi bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaiḥ sattvāḥ karmopacayairavihitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3928: teṣāṃ bhūyastvena asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cittāni pratikūlāni bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3930: na hyanupacitakuśalamūlāḥ sattvā asyāṃ bhūyastvena bhūtakoṭyāṃ praskandanti prasīdanti /
S06bsu049_u:3931: upacitakuśalamūlāḥ khalu punaste bhagavan sūpacitakuśalamūlāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3933_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo yojanaśatikādaṭavīkāntārād dviyojanaśatikādvā triyojanaśatikādvā
S06bsu049_u:3934: sa niṣkramya paśyetpūrvanimittāni gopālakān vā paśupālakān vā sīmā vā ārāmasaṃpado vā vanasaṃpado vā,
S06bsu049_u:3936: yairnimittairgrāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamo va sūcyeta /
S06bsu049_u:3937: tasya tāni pūrvanimittāni dṛṣṭaivaṃ bhavati - yathemāni pūrvanimittāni dṛśyante,
S06bsu049_u:3938: tathā āsanno me grāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamo vā iti /
S06bsu049_u:3941: evameva bhagavan yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate,
S06bsu049_u:3944: nāpi tenotrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na bhetavyaṃ śrāvakabhūmervā pratyekabuddhabhūmervā /
S06bsu049_u:3946: tathā hi asyemāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante yadutemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:3950: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan iha kaścideva puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:3952: yathā yathā ca sa gacchenmahāsamudraṃ darśanāya,
S06bsu049_u:3953: tathā tathā sacetpaśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā [Vaidya_108] parvatanimittaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:3954: tenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ dūre tāvadito mahāsamudra iti /
S06bsu049_u:3955: sacenna bhūyaḥ paśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:3956: tenaivaṃ veditavyam - abhyāsanna ito mahāsamudra iti /
S06bsu049_u:3959: na mahāsamudrasyābhyantare kaścitstambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ veti /
S06bsu049_u:3960: kiṃcāpi sa na mahāsamudraṃ sākṣātpaśyati cakṣuṣā,
S06bsu049_u:3961: atha ca punaḥ sa niṣṭhāṃ gacchati - abhyāsanno'smi mahāsamudrasya,
S06bsu049_u:3963: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvatā veditavyam - kiṃcāpyahaṃ taistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairna saṃmukhaṃ vyākṛtaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3966: tathā hyenāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:3967: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan vasante pratyupasthite śīrṇaparṇapalāśeṣu nānāvṛkṣeṣu nānāpallavāḥ prādurbhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:3968: pallaveṣu prādurbhūteṣvāttamanaskā bhavanti jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ tāni pūrvanimittāni vaneṣu dṛṣṭvā nacirādvanapuṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca prādurbhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:3969: tatkasya heto? tathā hi imāni pūrvanimittāni stambeṣu dṛśyanta iti /
S06bsu049_u:3970: evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo labhate imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:3972: tadā paripakvakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ - tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlenopanāmiteyaṃ tasmai gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3974: tāḥ pramuditā bhavanti prītisaumanasyajātāḥ - paurvakāṇāmapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimānyeva pūrvanimittānyabhūvannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervyākaraṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:3975: nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:3976: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan strī gurviṇī gurugarbhā /
S06bsu049_u:3977: tasyā yadā kāyo veṣṭate, adhimātraṃ vā kāyaklamatho jāyate, na ca sā caṃkramaṇaśīlā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3985: paurvakeṇāyoniśomanasikāreṇāsevitena niṣevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāyena vedanāṃ pratyanubhavāmīti,
S06bsu049_u:3986: tadā veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan - yathāsyāḥ pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante,
S06bsu049_u:3987: tathā nacireṇa bateyaṃ strī prasoṣyate iti /
S06bsu049_u:3988: evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:3991: tadā veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan - nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //
S06bsu049_u:3992: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu śāriputra /
S06bsu049_u:3994: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsuparigṛhītāśca suparīttāśca suparīnditāśca ime bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena /
S06bsu049_u:3995_0: bhagavānāha - tathā hi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bahujanahitāya [Vaidya_109]
S06bsu049_u:3995_1: pratipannā bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya
S06bsu049_u:3998: subhūtirāha - iha bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati?
S06bsu049_u:3999: bhagavānāha - yadi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasya vṛddhiṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:4001: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:4002: na vijñānasya vṛddhiṃ samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:4003: na rūpasya parihāṇiṃ samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:4004: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:4005: na vijñānasya parihāṇiṃ samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:4013: rūpamacintyamityapi subhūte na saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:4015: vijñānamacintyamityapi subhūte na saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitāyām //
S06bsu049_u:4016: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ko'tra bhagavan adhimokṣayiṣyati evaṃgambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06bsu049_u:4017: bhagavānāha - yaḥ śāriputra caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu049_u:4019: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - kathaṃ bhagavan caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:4021: bhagavānāha - iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balāni na kalpayati,
S06bsu049_u:4030: evaṃ caritāvī śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kvaciccarati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:4031: evaṃ sa caritāvītyucyate, caritāvīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate //
S06bsu049_u:4032: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /

S06bsu049_u:4035_1: pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ

S06bsu049_u:4037_1: pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06bsu049_u:4039_0: tathā hi subhūte imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ
S06bsu049_u:4039_1: pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06bsu049_u:4040: tatra śīghraṃ likhatā sacenmāsena vā māsadvayena vā māsatrayeṇa vā likhyeta, likhitavyaiva bhavet /

S06bsu049_u:4057: ye te'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,

S06bsu049_u:5040: kena kāreṇena subhūte sarvadharmāṇām api pramāṇaṃ na vidyate?
S06bsu049_u:5049: evaṃ sarvadharmā api subhūte asamasamāḥ, ākāśasamatvātsubhūte sarvadharmāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:5050: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api tu astyākāśasya samo vā gaṇanā vā pramāṇaṃ vā tulyaṃ vā cittaṃ vā caitasikā vā dharmāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:5052: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte anena paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā api acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:5053: ete ca subhūte tathāgatadharmā acintyāścittoparamatvāt, atulyāstulanāsamatikrāntatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:5055: evamaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamā iti subhūte samasaṃkhyāpramāṇoparamatvādaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāstathāgatadharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:5056: ākāśasamāsaṃkhyeyāprameyatayā asamasamā asaṃkhyeyā aprameyā ete dharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:5064: asyāṃ khalu punaracintyatāyāmatulyatāyāmaprameyatāyāmasaṃkhyeyatāyāmasamasamatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
S06bsu049_u:5065: viṃśateś ca bhikṣuṇīśatānām anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,
S06bsu049_u:5068: viṃśatyā ca bodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt /
S06bsu049_u:5069: te ca bhagavatā ihaiva bhadrakalpe vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:5070: ye 'pi te upāsakā upāsikāś ca yeṣāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,
S06bsu049_u:5073: [Vaidya_140] atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:5075: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:5082: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya yāni tāni rājakṛtyāni,
S06bsu049_u:5087: evameva subhūte ye kecidbuddhadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā śrāvakadharmā vā,
S06bsu049_u:5090: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa mahākṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā rūpasyāparigrahāya anabhiniveśāya /
S06bsu049_u:5097: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan sarvajñatāyā aparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
S06bsu049_u:5098: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvamarhattvaṃ yatra parigrahaṃ vā abhiniveśaṃ vā kuryāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:5100: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaṃ parigṛhṇīyāmabhiniveśeyaṃ vā arhattvamiti /
S06bsu049_u:5102: aham api subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:5103: so 'haṃ subhūte tathāgatatvamasamanupaśyan na parigṛhṇāmi nābhiniveśe /
S06bsu049_u:5106: mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ parīttakuśalamūlā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:5107: api tu khalu punarbhagavan ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā hetusaṃpannāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā dīrgharātrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:5108: ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:5110: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:5115: te sarve śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā careyuḥ yaśceha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmekadivasam api kṣāntiṃ rocayedgaveṣeta cintayettulayedupaparīkṣeta upanidhyāyet,
S06bsu049_u:5117_0: evamukte bhagavāṃstān kāmāvacarān [Vaidya_141] rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayāmāsa
S06bsu049_u:5117_1: - yadi devaputrāḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāt,
S06bsu049_u:5119: na tveva teṣāṃ śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā caratām /
S06bsu049_u:5120: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:5121: ityuktvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikād gamiṣyāma ityārocya prakrāntāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:5129_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06bsu049_u:5129_1: sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimucyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
S06bsu049_u:5129_2: nāvatiṣṭhate na dhandhāyati na vicikitsati na kāṅkṣati,
S06bsu049_u:5132_0: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ
S06bsu049_u:5132_1: prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimokṣyate nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate nāvasthāsyate na dhandhāyiṣyati
S06bsu049_u:5137: chandaṃ janayiṣyatyudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitum,
S06bsu049_u:5140: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte taruṇavatsā gaurnotsṛjati vatsam,
S06bsu049_u:5141: evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā tāvanna prahāsyati dharmabhāṇakaṃ yāvadasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kāyagatā vā bhaviṣyati pustakagatā vā,
S06bsu049_u:5142: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyuto manuṣyeṣvevopapannaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:5143: subhūtirāha - syādbhagavan etaireva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:5144: bhagavānāha - syātsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo 'nyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchya paripraśnīkṛtya tebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:5146: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastuṣitebhyo devebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:5148: yena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paryupāsitaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ paripṛcchitaḥ paripraśnīkṛtaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya,
S06bsu049_u:5150: yena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutā,
S06bsu049_u:5153: tasya punar api manuṣyeṣvevopapannasya asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam,
S06bsu049_u:5159: tathā hi asyāṃ asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam,
S06bsu049_u:5162: punaraparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato 'pi śrutā bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:5163: paryupāsitā paripṛṣṭā paripṛcchitā paripraśnīkṛtā ca bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:5164: ekaṃ vā dinaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā pañca vā dināni,
S06bsu049_u:5169: evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati - yena pūrvaṃ na saṃparipṛṣṭā bhavatīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:5173: tasya kaṃcitkālaṃ chando 'nuvartate asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śravaṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:5179: navena yānenāgataḥ sa bodhisattvastāṃ śraddhāṃ taṃ prasādaṃ taṃ chandaṃ prahāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:5180: yadutaināṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nānugrahīṣyati nānuvartiṣyate nānuparivārayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:5181: tasya dvayorbhūmyoranyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
S06bsu049_u:5182: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ te tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā na gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:5184: veditavyam etat - aprāptā evaite pāramudake kālaṃ kariṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:5185: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:5190: evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvaḥ śraddhāmātrakeṇa prasādamātrakeṇa premamātrakeṇa chandamātrakeṇa samanvāgataḥ sa ca prajñāpāramitāṃ nādhyālambate,
S06bsu049_u:5192: aprāpta eva sarvajñatāṃ śrāvakatve pratyekabuddhatve vā sthāsyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:5193: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasti śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:5209_0: evaṃ teṣāṃ sā śraddhā sā kṣāntiḥ sā rūciḥ sa cchandaḥ tadvīryaṃ so 'pramādaḥ sādhimuktiḥ
S06bsu049_u:5209_1: so 'dhyāśayaḥ sa tyāgaḥ tadgauravaṃ sā prītiḥ tatprāmodyaṃ sa prasādaḥ tatprema sā
S06bsu049_u:5210: te ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prāpya sarvajñatāyāṃ sthāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:5211: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī va puruṣo vā aparipakvena ghaṭenodakaṃ parivahet,
S06bsu049_u:5214: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma tadaparipakvatvāddhaṭasya, sa bhūmiparyavasāna eva bhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:5215: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti rūciḥ asti chandaḥ asti vīryam astyapramādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:5222: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca aparigṛhīto bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:5223: veditavyametatsubhūte ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyata iti /
S06bsu049_u:5224: kaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasyāntarā vyadhvani vyavasādaḥ - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā?
S06bsu049_u:5225: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā suparipakvena ghaṭena nadīto vā sarasto vā taḍāgato vā udapānādvā tato 'nyebhyo vā udakādhārebhya udakaṃ parivahet,
S06bsu049_u:5226: tasya tadudakaṃ parivahato veditavyametatsubhūte svastinā [Vaidya_144] anantarāyeṇa ayaṃ ghaṭo gṛhaṃ gamiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:5228: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:5237: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:5238: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyate /
S06bsu049_u:5240: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvamanākoṭitāmaparikarmakṛtāṃ cirabandhanabaddhāmudake 'vatārya samāropitabhāṇḍāṃ paripūrṇāṃ bhārārtāmabhirūḍhaḥ syāt,
S06bsu049_u:5243: tasyānyena bhāṇḍaṃ bhaviṣyati, anyena sā naurvipatsyate iti /
S06bsu049_u:5244: evaṃ sa sārthavāho 'nupāyakuśalo dauṣprajñena mahatā arthaviyogena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:5246: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:5257: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:5258: veditavyametatsubhūte aprāpta evāyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāratnākaramantarā saṃsatsyati,
S06bsu049_u:5263: kā punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya antarā vyadhvani saṃsīdanā?
S06bsu049_u:5265_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paṇḍitajātīyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvaṃ subaddhāṃ bandhayitvā
S06bsu049_u:5265_1: svākoṭitāmākoṭayitvā suparikarmakṛtāṃ kṛtvā udake 'vatārya bhāṇḍamāropya pūrṇāṃ kṛtvā
S06bsu049_u:5265_2: samaṃ yojayitvā yuktena vātenābhipretāṃ diśamanupūrveṇa gacchet,
S06bsu049_u:5269: mahālābhena cāyaṃ sārthavāhaḥ saṃyokṣyate yaduta laukikai ratnairiti /
S06bsu049_u:5270: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruci chandaḥ asti vīryam,
S06bsu049_u:5279: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena cāvirahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:5280: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
S06bsu049_u:5284: evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati - yato 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:5298: ete cāsya dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena cāvirahitā na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pratipatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:5300: tenaite dharmā abhimukhāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ tato 'syā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāya bhaviṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:5301: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:5302: tasya kaścideva śarīre vyādhirutpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā /
S06bsu049_u:5303: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣo 'parigṛhīto mañcāduttiṣṭhet?
S06bsu049_u:5305: bhagavānāha - sacetpunaḥ subhūte sa puruṣo mañcāduttiṣṭhet,
S06bsu049_u:5306: atha ca punarna pratibalo 'rdhakrośāntaram api prakramitum /
S06bsu049_u:5307: sa tayā jarayā tena ca vyādhinā kṣapito yady api mañcāduttiṣṭhet,
S06bsu049_u:5309: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:5323: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:5325: atha ca punaḥ subhūte evaṃ veditavyam - ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
S06bsu049_u:5327: yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:5328: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītatvādupāyakauśalyena ca virahitatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:5329: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa eva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:5330: tasya śarīre kaścideva vyādhirūtpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā,
S06bsu049_u:5332_0: tamenaṃ dvau balavantau puruṣau vāmadakṣiṇābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ svadhyālambitamadhyālambya
S06bsu049_u:5332_1: suparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhya evaṃ vadetām - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi yāvaccākāṅkṣasi gantum,
S06bsu049_u:5337: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:5352: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
S06bsu049_u:5359: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ādikarmikeṇa bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06bsu049_u:5360_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena
S06bsu049_u:5360_1: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:5363: tānyeva cāsya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:5364: evaṃ cāsmai prajñāpāramitāyā arthamupadekṣyanti - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyasva,
S06bsu049_u:5365: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyasva /
S06bsu049_u:5366: yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra dānaṃ dadāsi, tatsarvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya /
S06bsu049_u:5367: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:5368: evaṃ mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārebhyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:5369: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vijñānataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:5370: tatkasya hetoḥ? aparāmṛṣṭā hi kulaputra sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:5371: evaṃ yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra śīlaṃ rakṣasi..........peyālaṃ..............yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntyā saṃpādayasi,
S06bsu049_u:5374: yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoṣi,

S06bsu049_u:5682: yā nānyatra sarvadharmatathatāyāḥ, na sā kasyacinna tathatā /

S06bsu049_u:5698: iti hi subhūtitathatā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:5699: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā ca subhūtitathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:5703: yayā tathatayā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ san tathāgata iti nāmadheyaṃ labhate /
S06bsu049_u:5704: asyāṃ khalu punastathātagatathatāyāṃ nirdiśyamānāyāmiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamakampat,
S06bsu049_u:5712: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - evaṃ hi devaputrāḥ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:5713_0: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro na rūpamanujāto na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān
S06bsu049_u:5713_1: na vijñānamanujāto na srotaāpattiphalamanujāto na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ na anāgāmiphalaṃ
S06bsu049_u:5713_2: na arhattvaphalamanujāto na pratyekabuddhatvamanujāto na buddhatvamanujātaḥ /

S06bsu049_u:5719: asmin khalu punastathatānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trayāṇāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,

S06bsu049_u:5730: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra pakṣiṇaḥ śakuneryojanaśatiko vā dviyojanaśatiko vā triyojanaśatiko vā caturyojanaśatiko vā pañcayojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhavet /

S06bsu049_u:5740: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakunirakṛto 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhet?
S06bsu049_u:5742: kṛtaś ca sa bhagavan upahataś ca bhavejjambūdvīpe ca patitaḥ san maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham /

S06bsu049_u:5756: sacedayaṃ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavet,

S06bsu049_u:5758_1: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tacchīlaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ tāṃ prajñāṃ tāṃ vimuktiṃ tadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ samanvāharati,
S06bsu049_u:5760: na sa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śīlaṃ na jānāti na paśyati /

S06bsu049_u:6216: evaṃ te avirahitā bhavanti tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataparyupāsanena tathāgataparyupasthānena ca //
S06bsu049_u:6217_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kāmāvacarebhyo devebhyaścyutā
S06bsu049_u:6217_1: rūpāvacarebhya ārūpyāvacarebhyo vā devebhyaścyutāḥ santaḥ ihaiva madhyadeśe jambūdvīpe pratyājāyante /
S06bsu049_u:6225: alpakāḥ pratyantajanapadeṣu pratyājāyante, yadbhūyastvena madhyadeśe pratyājāyante /
S06bsu049_u:6226: ye 'pi pratyanteṣu janapadeṣu pratyājāyante, te 'pi mahānagareṣu pratyājāyante /
S06bsu049_u:6228: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:6229: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - avinivartanīyo vāham,
S06bsu049_u:6231: nāsyaivaṃ vicikitsotpadyate, na cāsya saṃśayo bhavati, svasyāṃ bhūmau nāpyasya saṃsīdanā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:6232: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphale svakāyāṃ bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati /
S06bsu049_u:6237: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakārī ānantaryacittena avirahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:6239: na taccittaṃ śaknoti prativinodayituṃ [Vaidya_168] vā viṣkambhayituṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:6241: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyacittaṃ sthitaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:6243: sadevamānuṣāsureṇāpi lokena na śakyaṃ cālayituṃ vā kampayituṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:6246: tasya svasyāṃ bhūmau niṣkāṅkṣasya nirvicikitsasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittaṃ votpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:6248: abhisaṃbhotsye evāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ svasyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6249: aparapraṇeyo bhavati, anavamardanīyaś ca bhavati svasyāṃ bhūmau /
S06bsu049_u:6250: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa cittena asaṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:6254: na tava te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni vā saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:6258: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
S06bsu049_u:6259: sacetpunarevaṃ samanvāharati - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhaveṣamabhinirmāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6260: mārādhiṣṭhito vā māranirmito veti, nāyaṃ tathāgataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6263: evaṃ samanvāharati - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā māṃ vivecayitukāmo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhita iti /
S06bsu049_u:6265: veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6267: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ime ākārā imāni liṅgāni imāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:6269: addhā batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6272: tathā hyasya te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:6274: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:6275: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśaḥ ātmaparityāgam api karoti,
S06bsu049_u:6277: tasmādbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyaḥ saddharmaparigrahāya paramudyogamāpadyate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ premṇā ca gauraveṇa ca /
S06bsu049_u:6278: dharmakāyā buddhā bhagavanta iti dharme prema ca gauravaṃ copādāya [Vaidya_169] saddharmaparigrahaṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:6280: pratyutpannānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva saddharmaparigrahaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6281: anāgatānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva saddharmaparigrahaḥ - aham api tatra teṣāmanāgatānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃkhyāṃ gaṇanāṃ praviṣṭa iti,
S06bsu049_u:6284: sa imamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśa ātmaparityāgam api karoti,
S06bsu049_u:6286: na ca tatra saṃsīdati, na ca kausīdyamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:6287: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:6288: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati, na vicikitsati /
S06bsu049_u:6289: subhūtirāha - kiṃ tathāgatasyaiva bhagavan dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati, na śrāvakasya?
S06bsu049_u:6290: bhagavānāha - śrāvakasyāpi subhūte dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati /
S06bsu049_u:6292: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā /
S06bsu049_u:6294: śṛṇvaṃś ca na kāṅkṣati, na vicikitsati /
S06bsu049_u:6295: ebhiḥ subhūte guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:6296: imāny api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ākāraliṅganimittāni veditavyānyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //
S06bsu049_u:6301: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan mahāguṇasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6304: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:6306: avinivartanīyena hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anantamaparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdhamasaṃhāryaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ //
S06bsu049_u:6307: subhūtirāha - pratibalo bhagavan avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānākārān liṅgāni nimittāni nirdeṣṭum /
S06bsu049_u:6308: ata eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni sūcayitavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:6309: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte yastvaṃ gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānānyārabhya nigamayitukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6311: ānimittasya apraṇihitasya anabhisaṃskārasya anutpādasya ajāterabhāvasya virāgasya nirodhasya nirvāṇasya vigamasyaitatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ yaduta gambhīramiti //
S06bsu049_u:6312: subhūtirāha - eteṣāmeva bhagavan kevalametaddharmāṇāmadhivacanaṃ na punaḥ sarvadharmāṇām?
S06bsu049_u:6314: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte gambhīram /
S06bsu049_u:6320: yathā subhūte tathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ rūpam /
S06bsu049_u:6322: yathā subhūte tathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ vijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:6323: tatra subhūte yathā rūpatathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ rūpam /
S06bsu049_u:6325: tatra subhūte yathā vijñānatathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ vijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:6326: yatra subhūte na rūpam, iyaṃ rūpasya gambhīratā /
S06bsu049_u:6327: yatra subhūte na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam,
S06bsu049_u:6330: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena rūpataś ca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sucitam /
S06bsu049_u:6332: yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena vijñānataś ca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam /
S06bsu049_u:6333_0: bhagavānāha - imāni subhūte gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni
S06bsu049_u:6333_1: yaścintayiṣyanti tulayiṣyati upanidhyāsyati - evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyāmājñaptam /
S06bsu049_u:6336: tathā saṃpādayamānastathopanidhyāyaṃstathopaparīkṣamāṇastathā prayujyamānastathā ghaṭamānastathā vyāyacchamāna ekadivasamapyatra yogamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:6338: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6339: tasya puruṣasya rāgacaritasya vitarkacaritasya striyā abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā saha saṃketaḥ kṛto bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:6340: sā khalu punaḥ strī [Vaidya_171] paraparigṛhītā bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:6342: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte kiṃpratisaṃyuktāstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran?
S06bsu049_u:6343: subhūtirāha - strīpratisaṃyuktā eva bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran - iyamāgacchati, iyamāgatā /
S06bsu049_u:6344: tayā sārdhamevaṃ kariṣyāmi, evaṃ ramiṣyāmi, evaṃ krīḍiṣyāmi, evaṃ pravicārayiṣyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:6345: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya kiyanto vitarkā utpadyeran?
S06bsu049_u:6346: subhūtirāha - bahavo bhagavan divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya vitarkā utpadyeran /
S06bsu049_u:6347: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasyātyayena vitarkā utpadyeran,
S06bsu049_u:6348: iyataḥ subhūte kalpān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaśchorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti saṃsārādvyantīkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:6349: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathājñaptaṃ yathākhyātaṃ yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ tiṣṭhati śikṣate pratipadyate upanidhyāyati yogamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:6352: evaṃ hi subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyogamanuyuktaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6355: yaś ca prajñāpāramitāvirahito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:6356: ayameva tato viśiṣyate yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamekadivasam api prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate //
S06bsu049_u:6357: punaraparaṃ subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpannebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:6361: tathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet, virahitaś ca prajñāpāramitāyā /
S06bsu049_u:6362: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathaiva yogamāpadyeta ekadivasam api /
S06bsu049_u:6363: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvadbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:6364: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:6367: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikārādvyutthāya dharmaṃ deśayet,
S06bsu049_u:6368: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:6369: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:6373: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikāradvyutthāya dharmadānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:6374: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:6375: [Vaidya_172] punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:6377: ārabdhavīryaḥ san dhyāneṣu bodhipakṣeṣu ca dharmeṣu yogamāpadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:6379: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:6380: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:6381: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:6383: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:6384: pariṇāmya ca pratisaṃlāne na punareva yogamāpadyeta /
S06bsu049_u:6385: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānameva dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:6387: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tāvatpuṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:6388: yāvadya evaṃ dharmadānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratisaṃlāne ca punareva yogamāpadyamānaḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītastatpratisaṃlānamavirahitaṃ karoti prajñāpāramitayā,
S06bsu049_u:6389: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:6390: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan abhisaṃskāro vikalpa ityuktaṃ bhagavatā,
S06bsu049_u:6392: bhagavānāha - so 'pīdānīṃ subhūte puṇyābhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śūnyaka ityevākhyāyate,
S06bsu049_u:6396: yathā yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmān pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:6397: tathā tathā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā /
S06bsu049_u:6398: yathā yathā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā,
S06bsu049_u:6400: subhūtirāha - aprameyasya ca bhagavan asaṃkhyeyasya ca kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā, kaḥ prativiśeṣo vā?
S06bsu049_u:6402: asaṃkhyeyamiti subhūte yanna śakyaṃ saṃkhyayāpi kṣapayitum //
S06bsu049_u:6403: subhūtirāha - syādbhagavan paryāyo yadrūpamaprameyaṃ bhavet, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6405: bhagavānāha - yatsubhūtirevamāha - syādbhagavan paryāyo yadrūpamaprameyaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:6408: syātsubhūte paryāyo yena rūpamevāprameyaṃ bhavet, evaṃ vedanaiva saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva /
S06bsu049_u:6414: [Vaidya_173] subhūtirāha - kiṃ śūnyatāyā eva bhagavan kevalametadadhivacanamaprameyamiti,
S06bsu049_u:6417: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ityākhyātāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:6419: bhagavānāha - ye ca subhūte śūnyāḥ, akṣayā api te /
S06bsu049_u:6421: tasmāttarhi subhūte eṣāṃ dharmāṇāmarthato viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:6422: abhilāpā ete subhūte tathāgatenākhyātāḥ abhilapitāḥ - aprameyamiti vā,
S06bsu049_u:6434: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadiyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā deśitā,
S06bsu049_u:6436: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi, tathā sarvadharmā api bhagavan anabhilāpyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6439: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā ca subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā, na sā śakyā abhilapitum /
S06bsu049_u:6440: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anabhilapyasyārthasya vṛddhirvāsti, parihāṇirvā vidyate?
S06bsu049_u:6443: dānapāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:6448: prajñāpāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:6449: sacedbhagavan āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6450: kathaṃ bhagavan vivardhamānānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ balena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:6452: na ca bhagavan apratipūrayan pāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6454: na khalu punaḥ subhūte pāramitārthasya kācidvṛddhirvāsti parihāṇirvā vidyate /
S06bsu049_u:6455: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dānapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:6457: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dānapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:6458: sa dānaṃ dadat tān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:6460: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ śīlapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:6462: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta śīlapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:6463: sa śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:6465: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:6467: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta kṣāntipāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:6468: sa kṣāntyā saṃpādayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:6470: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ vīryapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:6472: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta vīryapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:6473: sa vīryamārabhamāṇastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:6475: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:6477: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dhyānapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:6478: sa dhyānāni samāpadyamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:6480: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:6482: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta prajñāpāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:6483: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:6485: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kā punareṣā bhagavan anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06bsu049_u:6487: na ca subhūte tathatā vivardhate, vā, parihīyate vā /
S06bsu049_u:6491: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
S06bsu049_u:6493: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇām api subhūte na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
S06bsu049_u:6494: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhirevaṃrūpairmanasikārairviharan āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //
S06bsu049_u:6499: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ punarbhagavan prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:6503: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlānāmupacayo bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:6504: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tailapradyotasya jvalato 'rciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā,
S06bsu049_u:6507: na hi bhagavan arciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā /
S06bsu049_u:6508: na ca prathamābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā /
S06bsu049_u:6509: na ca bhagavan paścimābhinipātenārciṣā sā vartirdagdhā,
S06bsu049_u:6510: na ca paścimābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā /
S06bsu049_u:6511: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sā vartirdagdhā?
S06bsu049_u:6513: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte na ca prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:6519: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīro 'yaṃ bhagavan pratītyasamutpādaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6520: na ca nāma bhagavan prathamacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:6521: na ca nāma prathamacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:6522: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:6523: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:6524: na ca nāma taiścittotpādairna cānyatra tebhyaścittotpādebhyo 'bhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:6526: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittaṃ niruddham,
S06bsu049_u:6529: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittamanutpannam, api nu tannirodhadharmi?
S06bsu049_u:6531: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yannirodhadharmi, api nu tannirotsyate?
S06bsu049_u:6533: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittamanutpannam, api nu tannirodhadharmi?
S06bsu049_u:6535: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yannirodhadharmi, api nu tannirotsyate?
S06bsu049_u:6540: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvaniruddha eva, sa dharmo nirotsyate?
S06bsu049_u:6542: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā nirotsyate? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:6543: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā?
S06bsu049_u:6544: āha - tathaiva bhagavan sthāsyati yathā tathatā /
S06bsu049_u:6545: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā, tadā mā kuṭasthā bhūt?
S06bsu049_u:6547: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte gambhīrā tathatā? āha - gambhīrā bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:6548: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase tathatāyāṃ cittam? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:6549: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte cittaṃ tathatā? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:6550: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte anyattathatāyāścittam? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:6551: bhagavānāha - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tathatām? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:6552: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ya evaṃ carati sa gambhīre carati?
S06bsu049_u:6553: āha - yo bhagavan evaṃ carati, sa na kvaciccarati /
S06bsu049_u:6554: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hyasya te samudācārā na pravartante, na samudācaranti /
S06bsu049_u:6555: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ carati, sa kva carati?
S06bsu049_u:6557: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramārthe carati, sa nimitte carati?
S06bsu049_u:6559: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tasya nimittamavibhāvitam? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:6560: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato nimittaṃ vibhāvitaṃ bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:6561: subhūtirāha - na sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prayujyate - kathamahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ carannihaiva nimittaprahāṇamanuprāpnuyāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:6566_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo
S06bsu049_u:6566_1: mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragatastrīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati - śūnyatāmānimittamapraṇihitaṃ ca,
S06bsu049_u:6570: tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpo hi āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaś ca divasaścokto bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:6571: sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitālābhī divase divase prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:6572: tato 'sya prajñāpāramitābhyāsataḥ svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāvaipulyena bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:6573: śāriputra āha - yatpunarāyuṣman subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā svapnāntaragataḥ karma śubhamaśubhaṃ vā karoti,
S06bsu049_u:6574: kiṃ bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā?
S06bsu049_u:6575: subhūtirāha - yathā svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā uktā bhagavatā,
S06bsu049_u:6576: tathā na tasya karmaṇo bhavatyācayo vā upacayo vā /
S06bsu049_u:6577: atha punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:6578: [Vaidya_177] bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā /
S06bsu049_u:6579: kathaṃ ca āyuṣman śāriputra vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati?
S06bsu049_u:6580: sacetsvapnāntaragataḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kṛtvā prativibuddhaḥ sannevaṃ vikalpayati - aho hataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6585: śāriputra āha - sacedāyuṣman subhūte sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati - aho hataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6589: bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā?
S06bsu049_u:6591: tasyāpi karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā bhavet? subhūtirāha - no hīdamāyuṣman śāriputra /
S06bsu049_u:6593: tadyathāpi nāma ākāśameva āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:6595: tasmāttarhyāyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇameva karmotpadyate, na anārambaṇam /
S06bsu049_u:6598: tatra kācidbuddhiḥ saṃkleśaṃ parigṛhṇāti, kācidbuddhirvyavadānaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
S06bsu049_u:6599: tasmāttarhi āyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā,
S06bsu049_u:6601: śāriputra āha - yadāyuṣman subhūte sarvārambaṇāni viviktāni ākhyātāni bhagavatā,
S06bsu049_u:6602: tadā kasmādāyuṣman subhūte sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā?
S06bsu049_u:6603: subhūtirāha - nimittīkṛtya āyuṣman śāriputra vidyamānamevārambaṇamārambaṇīkṛtya sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate, na anārambaṇā /
S06bsu049_u:6604: cetanāpyāyuṣman śāriputra viviktā, nimittam api viviktam /
S06bsu049_u:6610: śāriputra āha - yadāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:6613: subhūtirāha - ayamāyuṣman śāriputra maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6618: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ayamāyuṣman maitreya subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha - mayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6621: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadāyuṣmān subhūtirevamāha - ayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6623: kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yadetannāmadheyaṃ maitreya iti?
S06bsu049_u:6630: utāho yā rūpasya śūnyatā, sā visarjayiṣyati?
S06bsu049_u:6631: evaṃ yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām, [Vaidya_178] yā vijñānasya śūnyatā, sā visarjayiṣyati?
S06bsu049_u:6632: yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte rūpasya śūnyatā, na sā pratibalā visarjayitum /
S06bsu049_u:6634: yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte vijñānasya śūnyatā, na sā pratibalā visarjayitum /
S06bsu049_u:6635: tamapyahamāyuṣman subhūte dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi, yo dharmo visarjayet /
S06bsu049_u:6636: tamapyahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi, yo dharmo visarjayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6637: tamapyahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi, yena dharmeṇa visarjayet /
S06bsu049_u:6638: tamapyahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi, yo dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
S06bsu049_u:6639: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kaccitpunarāyuṣman maitreya tvayā ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6641: maitreya āha - na mayā āyuṣman śāriputra ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ, yathainān vācā bhāṣe /
S06bsu049_u:6647: api tu khalu punarāyuṣman śāriputra na kāyena spṛśyeta, na vācā bhāṣyeta, na manasā samanvāhriyeta /
S06bsu049_u:6649: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6650: yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritāvī nirdiśati //
S06bsu049_u:6651: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - kutaste śāriputra etadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti?
S06bsu049_u:6652: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ śāriputra taṃ dharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa samanvāgato 'rhanniti prabhāvyate?
S06bsu049_u:6654: bhagavānāha - evameva śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:6659: sa carannotrasyati, na saṃtrasyati, na saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:6662: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyālakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:6666: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaṃ parityaktavyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
S06bsu049_u:6667: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - yadi cenmāṃ vyālā bhakṣayeyuḥ, tebhya eva taddānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
S06bsu049_u:6671: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra me buddhakṣetre na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:6674: punaraparaṃ śāriputra corakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:6677: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvasvaparityāgakuśalābhiratā hi [Vaidya_179] bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:6678: utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktasarvapariṣkāropakaraṇena /
S06bsu049_u:6679: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - sacenmama sattvāḥ sarvapariṣkāropakaraṇāni hareyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6681: yadi cenmāṃ kecijjīvitādvyaparopayeyuḥ, tatra na mayā vyāpādakrodharoṣā utpādayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6682: teṣām api ca mayā na kāyena na vācā na manasā aparāddhavyam /
S06bsu049_u:6683: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:6687: yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataścorakāntārāṇy api tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante /
S06bsu049_u:6689: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante //
S06bsu049_u:6690: punaraparaṃ śāriputraṃ pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:6691: tatkasya hetoḥ? asaṃtrastānutrastadharmāṇo hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:6692: evaṃ cānena cittamutpādayitavyam - sarvasattvānāṃ mayā sarvatṛṣṇācchedāya śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:6693: na ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvenotrasitavyam, na saṃtrasitavyam, na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:6694: sacedahaṃ tṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kariṣyāmi, pretaloke mamopapattirbhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:6695: api tu khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike mahākaruṇācittamutpādayitavyam - aho bata alpapuṇyā amī sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:6699: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti, na prajñāsyante /
S06bsu049_u:6700: tathā ca sarvasattvān puṇyaiḥ saṃniyokṣye, yathā aṣṭāṅgopetapānīyalābhino 'mī bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:6701: tathā ca dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,

S06bsu049_u:7135_1: ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān dṛṣṭvā abhimānamutpādya avamanyamānastathārūpāṇi kalyāṇamitrāṇi na seviṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:7139: tasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
S06bsu049_u:7140_0: evaṃ subhūte satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyānacirayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya
S06bsu049_u:7141: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārakarma veditavyam //
S06bsu049_u:7142: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7143: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpedeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati?
S06bsu049_u:7144: iha subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ nāmāpadeśenāpi nāmādhiṣṭhānenāpi māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7145: anyatarānyatareṇa veṣeṇopasaṃkramya evaṃ vakṣyati - tairvyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:7152: yāvadāsaptamaṃ mātāmahapitāmahayugasya nāmadheyamudīrayiṣyati - amuṣyāṃ diśi tvaṃ jātaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7153: amuṣmin janapade amuṣmin grāme vā nagare vā [Vaidya_192] nigame vā jāta iti /
S06bsu049_u:7154: sacetprakṛtvā mṛduko bhaviṣyati, tamenamevaṃ vakṣyati - pūrvam api tvameva mṛduko 'bhūḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7155: sacetprakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyo bhaviṣyati, tatastamevaṃ vakṣyati - pūrvam api tvaṃ tīkṣṇendriyo 'bhūḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7171: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃstena tena dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇa guṇenādekṣyati - pūrvam api tvamanena cānena ca guṇena samanvāgato 'bhūḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7172: niyatastaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau /
S06bsu049_u:7173: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te amī evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:7175: evaṃ sa tena paurvakeṇa nāmāpadeśena nāmādhiṣṭhānena pratyutpannadhutaguṇasaṃlekhena ca manyanāmutpādayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7176: tasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati - vyākṛto 'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:7178: taṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ vakṣyati - avinivartanīyastvaṃ vyākṛtastathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:7179: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tava ete evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇā saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:7180: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāyīyān kadācidbhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:7191: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati - vyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau /
S06bsu049_u:7193: tathā hi te evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7195: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ guṇā ākhyātāḥ ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni cākhyātāni,
S06bsu049_u:7197: veditavyametatsubhūte tato 'nyairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ - mārādhiṣṭhito batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:7199: ye ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06bsu049_u:7201: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena nāmādhiṣṭhānena abhimānamutpādayiṣyati /
