S06bsu049_u:7205: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam?
S06bsu049_u:7206_0: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vyākariṣyati
S06bsu049_u:7206_1: - tavānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
S06bsu049_u:7206_2: yadeva tena cittenānuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritaṃ bhavati - aho bata me 'nuttarāṃ
S06bsu049_u:7208: tatra duṣprajñajātīyasya anupāyakuśalasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati - yathā mayā nāmadheyamanuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritam,
S06bsu049_u:7209: aho bata me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhavediti,
S06bsu049_u:7212: yacca tena māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhinirmitena mārādhiṣṭhitena vā bhikṣuṇā nāmadheyamudīritam,
S06bsu049_u:7213: tadubhayaṃ tulayitvā yathā ca mama cittotpāda utpannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7214: yathā ca anena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ sameti nāmnā,
S06bsu049_u:7215: nāmavyākṛto 'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti maṃsyate /
S06bsu049_u:7216: yāni ca mayā subhūte avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākārā liṅgāni nimittāni ākhyātāni,
S06bsu049_u:7219: sa manyanāmutpādya tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate - ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:7221: evaṃ sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena abhimānena mithyāmānena ca tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamanyamāno dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām,
S06bsu049_u:7224: sacetpunaściraṃ suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmo bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:7233: tatkasya hetoḥ? tāvadgurutaraṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mananāpattisthānam /
S06bsu049_u:7234: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bhikṣoḥ śrāvakayānikasya śrāvakabhūmau catasro mūlāpattayo gurvyo bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:7238: yaduta nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvamānanayā mahānakuśalaścittotpāda utpannaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7241: pañcabhyo 'pi subhūte ānantaryebhyaḥ [Vaidya_194] karmabhyo gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7242: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśena mānasahagataścittotpāda utpannaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7243: ayaṃ tebhyaḥ pañcabhya ānantaryebhyaḥ karmabhyo gurutaraścittotpādo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7244: iti hi subhūte anenāpi nāmāpadeśena sūkṣmasūkṣmāṇi mārakarmāṇyutpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:7247: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7248: kathaṃ ca subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati?
S06bsu049_u:7249: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:7250: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati - vivekasya tathāgato varṇavādī araṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādiṣu vihartavyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:7251: na cāhaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃvidhaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi,
S06bsu049_u:7252: yaduta āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni,
S06bsu049_u:7254_0: subhūtirāha - katamaḥ punaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyo viveko
S06bsu049_u:7254_1: yadi vā āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni vividhāni vanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādīni?
S06bsu049_u:7255: yadi tāni nādhyāvasati, kiyadrūpaḥ punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānyo vivekaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:7256: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto bhavati śrāvakapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7258: evaṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto viharati /
S06bsu049_u:7259: grāmānte 'pi hi viharan prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvamaitrīmahākaruṇāvihāreṇa viharet /
S06bsu049_u:7260: anena vihāreṇa viharan vivikta eva sa viharati /
S06bsu049_u:7261: ayaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktamanasikāraviveko 'nujñātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7262: anena vivekena viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdivānyatināmayati, vivikto viharati /
S06bsu049_u:7265: yaṃ punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekamupadekṣyati araṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānaprāntaśayanāsanavihārān,
S06bsu049_u:7266: sa tena vivekena śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ saṃkīrṇa eva san prajñāpāramitāyāmanabhiyujyamāno na sarvajñajñānaṃ paripūrayati /
S06bsu049_u:7267: evaṃ sa saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharan so 'pariśuddhena manasikāreṇa viharan apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ eva bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7268_0: apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmānta eva saṃstato 'nyān api bodhisattvān mahāsattvān grāmāntavihāriṇo
S06bsu049_u:7269: araṇye 'pi viharan so 'pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ san saṃkīrṇavihāryeva bhavati, na viviktavihārī /
S06bsu049_u:7272: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi so 'nupāyakuśalo bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:7273_0: kiṃcāpi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yojanaśatikeṣvaṭavīkāntāreṣu viharedapagatavyālamṛgapakṣisaṃgheṣu
S06bsu049_u:7274_0: varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ
S06bsu049_u:7274_1: vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā, tato vā upari /
S06bsu049_u:7275: imaṃ ca vivekaṃ mayopadiṣṭaṃ na jānīyāt,
S06bsu049_u:7279: naiva me subhūte etāvatā sa bodhisattvaścittamārādhayati /
S06bsu049_u:7281: yaḥ subhūte viveko bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mayā ākhyātaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7282: tena vivekena viharannasmin viveke na saṃdṛśyate /
S06bsu049_u:7283: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramya uparyantarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitvā evaṃ vakṣyati - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu049_u:7284: eṣa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatena viveka ākhyātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7287_0: sa tato vivekātpunareva araṇyādgrāmāntamavatīrya tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
S06bsu049_u:7288: sa evaṃ vakṣyati - saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa bateme āyuṣmanto viharanti, na viviktavihāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:7289: ākīrṇavihāreṇa bateme āyuṣmanto viharanti, na viviktavihāreṇa viharantīti /
S06bsu049_u:7290: ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā viviktavihāreṇa viharanti,
S06bsu049_u:7298: eṣa subhūte vihāro yenāhaṃ vihāreṇa viharāmi /
S06bsu049_u:7310: tajjātīyaḥ khaluḥ punaḥ subhūte pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7311: tatkasya hetoḥ? abhimānapatitā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7312: anyeṣām api tathārūpāṇāmalpa [Vaidya_196] sthāmānācirayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ saṃdūṣaṇaṃ kuryuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7313: aviśuddhadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalāḥ veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7314: anāryā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7315: anāryadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7316: yasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparityaktāḥ sarvasattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7319: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmarthaṃ kartukāmena tajjātīyāḥ pudgalā na sevitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7322_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvasattvānāmarthāya abhyutthitena eteṣāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ
S06bsu049_u:7323_0: tatrāpi tāvanmaitrāyamāṇena karuṇāyamānena mahākaruṇāmutpādya anukampāmupādāya samyakpratipanneṣu
S06bsu049_u:7323_2: - tathā kariṣyāmi yathā sarve mārakarmadoṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra
S06bsu049_u:7324: sacedutpatsyante, kṣiprameva pratigamiṣyanti, evaṃ śikṣiṣye iti /
S06bsu049_u:7325: ayam api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svayamabhijñāya parākramo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7326: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vivekaguṇena mārakarma veditavyamiti //
S06bsu049_u:7331_0: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - iha subhūte bodhisattvena
S06bsu049_u:7331_2: ādita evaṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:7332: subhūtirāha - katamāni tāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06bsu049_u:7333: yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayasaṃprasthitena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ādita eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni?
S06bsu049_u:7334: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - buddhā eva subhūte bhagavantaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7335: ye ca te 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvacaryākuśalāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7338: imāni tāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:7339: prajñāpāramitaiva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:7340: sarvā eva ca subhūte ṣaṭ pāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:7353: ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃvartante /
S06bsu049_u:7354: tatkasya hetoḥ? atra hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā pariniṣṭhitā bhavati yaduta ṣaṭpāramitāsu /
S06bsu049_u:7355: ye 'pi te subhūte atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya parinirvṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7358: ye 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06bsu049_u:7361: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvacintyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti,
S06bsu049_u:7367: aham api subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7368: mamāpi hi subhūte itonirjātaiva sarvajñatā, yaduta ṣaḍbhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7370: āsu hi subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā antargatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7375: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭ pāramitā eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06bsu049_u:7388: ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya sarvajñatāyai anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiprāptaye saṃvartante /
S06bsu049_u:7391_0: āsu khalu punaḥ subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06bsu049_u:7391_1: iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā
S06bsu049_u:7392: arthataś ca dharmataś ca nayataścopaparīkṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā paripraṣṭavyā paripraśnayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:7394: eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyikā saṃdarśikā avadarśikā janayitrī dhatrī /

S06bsu049_u:7639: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣāntisaṃpannā upaśamasaṃpannā apratihatacittā antato dagdhasthūṇāyāmapyāghātacittaṃ notpādayanti prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7640: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /

S06bsu049_u:7643: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7645: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānārāmā dhyānaratā dhyānabalino dhyānabalavanto dhyānapratiṣṭhitā dhyānavaśinaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7646: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7647: yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuralokaṃ sarvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānanupāyakuśalāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:7650: yo hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:7652: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:7654: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ pratipadyamāno nacirādgamiṣyati bodhimaṇḍam /
S06bsu049_u:7655: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sattvān kleśapaṅke saṃsīdamānānuddhariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7656: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:7659_0: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ [Vaidya_205] catvāro
S06bsu049_u:7659_1: lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ
S06bsu049_u:7660: imāni te catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena pratigrahītavyānīti /
S06bsu049_u:7661: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kevalaṃ catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:7664: tathāgatair api so 'rhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairnityameva samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7665: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāni kānicillaukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramikāṇi vā anyāni vā utpadyeran,
S06bsu049_u:7666: tānyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ notpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:7667: ayam api bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:7668: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhavat - kimayaṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ svakena pratibhānena bhāṣate,
S06bsu049_u:7670: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - buddhānubhāvo 'yamāryānanda veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7674: evam etat yathā śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa bhāṣitam /
S06bsu049_u:7680: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - yasmin khalu punarānanda samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:7683: tasmin ānanda samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7684: te sarve saṃśayitā bhavanti - kimayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā,
S06bsu049_u:7686: punaraparamānanda tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ śokaśalyaviddhā bhavanti yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati /
S06bsu049_u:7687: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:7690: tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viheṭhāmupasaṃharanti,
S06bsu049_u:7693: digdāhānupadarśayanti - apyeva nāma ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valīyeta vā romaharṣo vā asya bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:7695: tatra ānanda na sarvasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7698: ānanda āha - kiyadrūpasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upasaṃkrāmati māraḥ pāpīyān viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:7699: bhagavānāha - yena ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmadhimukticittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:7700: asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7702: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ saṃśayaprāpto bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:7705: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7707: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:7709: sa gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na śṛṇoti,
S06bsu049_u:7712: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7714: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saddharmaparigrāhakamālīno bhavati - eṣa mama sahāyakaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7716: bahavo 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mamānye 'pi sahāyakāḥ santi /
S06bsu049_u:7718: ayaṃ tu mayā pratirūpaḥ sahāyo labdhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7720: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7722: [Vaidya_207] punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmanyaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ vadet - gambhīrā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:7723: kiṃ tavainayā śrutayā? na hyevamatra yujyamānamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitam /
S06bsu049_u:7725: kiṃ tavainayā śrutayā likhitayā veti? evamanyān api bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vivecayate /
S06bsu049_u:7726: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7728: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyān bodhisattvānavamanyate - ahaṃ vivekavihāreṇa viharāmi,
S06bsu049_u:7731: tasminnānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:7734: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā dhutaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ vā bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:7735: evaṃ sa tāvanmātrakeṇa tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān kalyāṇadharmaṇo 'vamanyate /
S06bsu049_u:7736: te ca tasya guṇā na saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7737: ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ guṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7738: te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tasya na saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:7741: parān paṃsayati - na khalvete teṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante,
S06bsu049_u:7743: tatra mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmevaṃ bhavati - na śūnyāni mārabhavanāni bhaviṣyanti, utsadāni bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:7744: mahānirayāstiryañcaḥ pretaviṣayā āsurāś ca kāyā utsadā bhaviṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:7746: yathā te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ pravṛttā adhyākrāntā lābhasatkāreṇa bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7749: teṣāṃ ca sa mahājanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyate /
S06bsu049_u:7754: evaṃ te na tathatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā na tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānāḥ saṃkleśaṃ vivardhayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:7755: evaṃ te viparyastayā cittasaṃtatyā yadyadeva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
S06bsu049_u:7760: imamapyānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:7761: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:7762: tasmin [Vaidya_208] samaye mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavati - dūrīkariṣyati batāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvajñatām,
S06bsu049_u:7763_0: atidūre sthāsyati sarvajñatāyāḥ sacetpunarbodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nyena bodhisattvayānikena
S06bsu049_u:7763_1: pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośati paribhāṣate vyāpadyate doṣamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:7764: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān bhūyasyā mātrayā tuṣṭo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:7766: evaṃ cāsya bhavati - ubhāvapyetau bodhisattvau dūre sthāsyataḥ sarvajñatāyā iti //
S06bsu049_u:7767: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛto 'vyākṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ kalahāyet vivadet vigṛhṇīyāt ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayet,
S06bsu049_u:7769: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittotpāde tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7771: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ kiṃcinniḥsaraṇam,
S06bsu049_u:7772: utāho tāvata eva kalpānavaśyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:7773: bhagavānāha - saniḥsaraṇamānanda mayā dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām /
S06bsu049_u:7774: tatra ānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya na pratideśayati,
S06bsu049_u:7779: avaśyaṃ tena ānanda pudgalena punareva tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7780: yaḥ punarānanda bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya pratideśayati,
S06bsu049_u:7782: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayati - yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ vigrahā vivādā virodhā utsārayitavyā nidhyāpayitavyāḥ praśamayitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7784: lābhā me durlabdhā na sulabdhāḥ, yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi /
S06bsu049_u:7786: so 'haṃ pareṣu tvamity api vācaṃ bhāṣe,
S06bsu049_u:7787: paruṣaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā prativaco dadāmi /
S06bsu049_u:7790: parato duruktāni durāgatāni durbhāṣitāni bhāṣyamāṇāni śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:7791: pareṣāmantike na mamaitatsādhu, na caitanmamāṃ pratirūpam, yo 'haṃ parasya doṣāntaraṃ saṃjāne /
S06bsu049_u:7792: etad api me na pratirūpam, yadahaṃ pareṣa doṣāntaram api śrotavyaṃ manye /
S06bsu049_u:7798: na ca mayā svaparāddheṣv api pareṣu vyāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:7802: na ca mayā jīvitāntarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ, na bhrukuṭirmukhe utpādayitavyeti /
S06bsu049_u:7804: evaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikānām api pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:7807: kathaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apareṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam?
S06bsu049_u:7809: ete mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śāstāra ityevaṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:7815: yathaiva caibhiḥ śikṣitavyam, tathaiva mayā śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:7816: sacetpunareṣāṃ kaścidvyavakīrṇavihāreṇa vihariṣyati, na mayā vyavakīrṇavihāreṇa vihartavyam /
S06bsu049_u:7819: evaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyo na bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7825: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kva punarbhagavan śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate?
S06bsu049_u:7826: bhagavānāha - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:7827: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau /
S06bsu049_u:7828: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirvāṇe śikṣate, sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:7829: subhūtirāha - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām,
S06bsu049_u:7830: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām?
S06bsu049_u:7831: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:7832: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāmiti?
S06bsu049_u:7833: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate, api nu sā kṣīyate?
S06bsu049_u:7835: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan kṣayaḥ kṣīyate /
S06bsu049_u:7837: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:7838: api nu sā utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā jāyate vā bhavati vā vibhavati vā vivicyate vā rajyate vā virajyate vā ākāśībhavati vā dharmībhavati vā?
S06bsu049_u:7840: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate, api nu sā nirvāti?
S06bsu049_u:7842: bhagavānāha - tasmāttarhi subhūte evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ na tathatā kṣīyate ityevaṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:7843: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:7850: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāmanuprāpsyati /
S06bsu049_u:7851: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyo māreṇa vā māraparṣadā vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhimarditum /
S06bsu049_u:7853: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣatsyati /
S06bsu049_u:7854: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake gocare carati /
S06bsu049_u:7855: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate nāthakarakeṣu dharmeṣu,
S06bsu049_u:7860: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate triparivartasya dvādaśākārasya dharmacakrasya pravartanāya /
S06bsu049_u:7861: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadhātuṃ nonīkariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:7862: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatavaṃśasyānupacchedāya śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:7863: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'mṛtadhātudvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:7864: neyaṃ subhūte udārā [Vaidya_211] śikṣā śakyā hīnasattvena śikṣitum /
S06bsu049_u:7865: na hi alpasthāmnā śakyamasyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitum /
S06bsu049_u:7867: sarvasattvasārā hi te subhūte, sarvasattvanāthakāmā hi te subhūte, ye 'syāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante /
S06bsu049_u:7869: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nirayeṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:7878: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāndho bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:7899: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prāṇātipātī bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:7910: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:7915: asti hi tasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
S06bsu049_u:7916: tatpunaḥ subhūte upāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamat?
S06bsu049_u:7919: yathā anyenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:7921: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
S06bsu049_u:7924: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā evaṃ prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7925: tatkatamasya bhagavan dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
S06bsu049_u:7928: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:7929: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi subhūte prakṛtyaiva pariśuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7930: evaṃ subhūte prakṛtipariśuddheṣu sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya yā asaṃsīdanatā anavalīnatā,
S06bsu049_u:7932: evaṃ subhūte bālapṛthagjanā enān dharmānajānanto 'paśyanto dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ na jānanti, na paśyanti /
S06bsu049_u:7933: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ [Vaidya_212] kṛtaśaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyāyacchante,
S06bsu049_u:7935: vayamevamapaśyakān sattvān paśyayiṣyāmaḥ ityatra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante /
S06bsu049_u:7936: atra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā balānyanuprāpnuvanti, vaiśāradyānyanuprāpnuvanti /
S06bsu049_u:7938: evaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cittacaritavispanditāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti /
S06bsu049_u:7940: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakāste mahāpṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ ye 'pagatapāṣāṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7941: yatra suvarṇaṃ vā jātarūpaṃ vā rajataṃ votpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:7944: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7946: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7948: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7950: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7952: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7955: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante, ye śrāvakapratyekabuddhamārgamārūḍhāḥ //
S06bsu049_u:7956: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7958: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7960: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7962: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7964: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7966: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7968: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7970: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7972: tasmāttarhi subhūte alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:7974: tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpebhyo 'lpatarakāste sattvāḥ, ye tathatvāya pratipadyante /
S06bsu049_u:7975: [Vaidya_213] tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpatarakebhyastathatvāya pratipadyamānebhyo 'lpatamāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyante /
S06bsu049_u:7976: tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpatamebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānebhyo 'lpatamāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7978: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ya ete 'lpatamebhyo 'lpatamā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7979: teṣu gaṇanāṃ gantukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, yogamāpattavyam //
S06bsu049_u:7980: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya na khilasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:7988: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitā saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:7992: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatānyantargatāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:7993: evameva subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:7994: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye pravartamāne sarvāṇīndriyāṇyantargatāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:7995: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya sarvakuśalā dharmā antargatā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:7996: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:7997: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ajñāne niruddhe sarve 'kuśalā dharmā niruddhā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:7998: sarvāś ca tadanyāḥ pāramitā antargatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:7999: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8000: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmagratāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8002: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhyamāṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8004: subhūtirāha - jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvadbhagavan bahavaḥ sattvā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8005: kaḥ punarvādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8006: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte eko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhaṃstān sarvasattvān cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiścopatiṣṭhet,
S06bsu049_u:8007: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
S06bsu049_u:8009: bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:8012: evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā /
S06bsu049_u:8013_0: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
S06bsu049_u:8013_4: lokadhātau dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8014: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāhaṃ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:8016: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śrāvakasaṃpattir api tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:8017: bhagavānāha - śrāvakasaṃpattir api subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:8018: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakasaṃpatyāṃ sthāsyāmīti śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8020: ye 'pi te subhūte śrāvakagaṇāḥ, tān api sa jānāti, na ca tatrāvatiṣṭhate /
S06bsu049_u:8022: na ca prativahati - mayāpyete śrāvakaguṇā deśayitavyāḥ prakāśayitavyā iti śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8023: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:8024: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāṃstato 'nyān dakṣiṇīyān śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān pratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktāṃścābhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8026: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati,
S06bsu049_u:8028: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'parihāṇadharmā aparihāṇadharmeti veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8032: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā imāṃ sarvajñatāmāhariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:8035: atha tām api prajñāpāramitāṃ na saṃjānīte - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:8037: evam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte, na samanupaśyati /
S06bsu049_u:8038: sacedevaṃ carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, carati prajñāpāramitāyāmiti //
S06bsu049_u:8043: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - caranneva tāvadayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānabhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8044: kaḥ punarvādo yadā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8049: spṛhaṇīyāste sattvā ye sattvasārā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante //
S06bsu049_u:8050: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya puṣpāṇāmañjaliṃ kṛtvā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhyavākirat,
S06bsu049_u:8051: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - yairbodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam - anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmahe,
S06bsu049_u:8052: abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān mahatā saṃsārārṇavenohyamānān same pārime tīre pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
S06bsu049_u:8059: yatte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākaruṇayā samanvāgatā vivarteran anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:8060: na me bhagavan ekacittotpādo 'pyutpadyate yatte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ, tato vivarteran /
S06bsu049_u:8061: iti yadbhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ janayiṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8063: tayā mahākaruṇayā arthakāmā hitakāmā hi te sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānukampakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8064: ye imairevaṃrūpaiścittotpādaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kimiti vayaṃ tīrṇāḥ sattvāṃstārayema,
S06bsu049_u:8069: yasteṣāṃ bhagavan prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cittotpādānanumodate,
S06bsu049_u:8072: kiyatsa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
S06bsu049_u:8073: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sumeroḥ parvatarājasya palāgreṇa tulyamānasya pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:8074: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:8075: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:8076: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:8077: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:8078: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:8079: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta [Vaidya_216] dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:8080: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:8081: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:8082: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum //
S06bsu049_u:8083: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mārādhiṣṭhitāste bhagavan sattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8084: ye bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāmevamaprameyamanumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyamiti na śṛṇvanti,
S06bsu049_u:8090: mārabhavanebhyaś ca te bhagavan sattvāścyutā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8093: mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi tairbhagavan ime cittotpādā abhinirhṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8102: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:8107: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittopādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
S06bsu049_u:8110: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - evametadbhagavan, evametatsugata /
S06bsu049_u:8111: yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
S06bsu049_u:8121: na ca te amanaāpāni rūpāṇi drakṣyanti [NOTE: Conze translates "nor hear any unpleasant sounds"] /
S06bsu049_u:8122: na ca te amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8123: na ca te amanaāpān rasān paribhokṣyante /
S06bsu049_u:8124: na ca te amanaāpāni spraṣṭavyāni sprakṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8128_1: sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni yair api bhagavaṃśchandamutpādya bodhaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ
S06bsu049_u:8129: teṣāṃ te cittotpādā [Vaidya_217] vivardhamānā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8131: bhagavānāha - evametatkauśikaḥ, evametat, yathā tvayā vāgbhāṣitā tathāgatasyaivānubhāvena /
S06bsu049_u:8132: yena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8133_0: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ
S06bsu049_u:8133_1: tāṃścittotpādānanumodya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8135: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ ca bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:8136: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyopamaṃ cittam?
S06bsu049_u:8138: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyām? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:8139: nāhaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ nāpi māyāṃ samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:8140: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yanna māyāṃ nāpi māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi,
S06bsu049_u:8141: tatkiṃ tvamanyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:8143: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:8145: so 'haṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmasamanuśyan katamaṃ dharmamupadekṣyāmi astīti vā nāstīti vā?
S06bsu049_u:8146: yaś ca atyantavivikto dharmaḥ, na so 'stīti vā nāstīti vā upaiti /
S06bsu049_u:8148: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan asaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:8150: yaś ca dharmo 'tyantaviviktaḥ, nāsau dharmo bhāvayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8152: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tyantaviviktāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:8156: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan viviktena viviktamabhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:8157: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:8159: atyantaviviktā subhūte prajñāpāramitā, atyantaviviktaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8164: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:8170: tathā gambhīre bhagavan arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8175: taṃ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā //
S06bsu049_u:8179: tathā hi bhagavan sa eva dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:8182: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06bsu049_u:8188: āsannā me 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti sacedevamati na samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:8189: dūrīkṛtā me śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmirveti sacedasyaivam api na bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8191: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya naivaṃ bhavati - kasyacidahamāsannaḥ, kasyacidvā dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:8193: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarāṃ samyaksabodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:8194: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:8196: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati - māyākāro mamāsannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8197: yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:8199: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:8200: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:8202: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati - yenārambaṇena pratibhāsa utpadyate tanmamāsanne,
S06bsu049_u:8203: ye tu khalu punaratra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:8205: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:8206: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:8208: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatasya kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā na saṃvidyate, tatkasya hetoḥ?
S06bsu049_u:8210: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:8214: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena yo nirmitako nirmitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8215: na tasyaivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre,
S06bsu049_u:8218: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre,
S06bsu049_u:8221: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ, tatkṛtyaṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:8224: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06bsu049_u:8228: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā dārumayī strī vā puruṣo vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛto bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:8229: sa yasya kṛtyasyārthāya kṛtaḥ, tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:8232: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06bsu049_u:8235: tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādeva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā iti //
S06bsu049_u:8240: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati,
S06bsu049_u:8242: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati,
S06bsu049_u:8244: atha khalu saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāmetadabhavat - namaskartavyāste sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8249: anenāpi paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8252_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtisteṣāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāṃ cetasaiva
S06bsu049_u:8252_1: cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tāni saṃbahulāni kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇyāmantrayante
S06bsu049_u:8252_2: sma - nedaṃ devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaram,
S06bsu049_u:8254: idaṃ tu devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaraṃ caiva paramaduṣkaraṃ caiva,
S06bsu049_u:8255: yadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyānapramāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante /
S06bsu049_u:8256: te ca sattvā atyantatayā na saṃvidyante, asaṃvidyamānā nopalabhyante, sattvaviviktatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:8258: evaṃ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sattvān vineṣyāma iti,
S06bsu049_u:8259: ākāśaṃ sa devaputrā vinetavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ sattvān vinetavyān manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:8260: tatkasya hetoḥ? ākāśaviviktatayā hi devaputrāḥ sattvaviviktatā veditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8261: anena devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8263: ākāśena na sa devaputrāḥ sārdhaṃ veditavyaṃ manyeta,
S06bsu049_u:8264: yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:8265: ayaṃ ca saṃnāho bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8267: sā ca sattvaviviktatayaiva veditavyā, vainayikavivaktatayā ca sattvaviviktatā veditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8268: sacedatraivaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06bsu049_u:8270: tatkasya hetoḥ? sattvaviviktatayā hi rūpaviviktatā veditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8275: evaṃ devaputrāḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati /
S06bsu049_u:8277: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati?
S06bsu049_u:8279: anena bhagavan kāranena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati /
S06bsu049_u:8281: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan kaściddharma upalabhyate, yaḥ saṃsīdet /
S06bsu049_u:8282: so 'pi bhagavan dharmo nopalabhyeta, yena dharmeṇa yo dharmaḥ saṃsīdet /
S06bsu049_u:8284: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne nirdiśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:8291: sacedbhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:8292: evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8293: bhagavānāha - na kevalaṃ subhūte evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8294_0: ye 'pi te subhūte brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā
S06bsu049_u:8294_1: apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā
S06bsu049_u:8294_2: bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8295: te 'pi subhūte taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evaṃ carantaṃ namasyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8296: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8297: te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmevaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā paśyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8298: te ca subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamanugṛhṇanti, samanvāharanti /
S06bsu049_u:8299: ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanugṛhyante samanvāhriyante,
S06bsu049_u:8300: te te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8301: na ca teṣāmantarāyā utpatsyante mārato vā anyato vā /
S06bsu049_u:8303: ye subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ, te sarve mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bhaveyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8304: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte /
S06bsu049_u:8305: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8306: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvā mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8307: yāvanta subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8309: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte,
S06bsu049_u:8310: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8311: dvābhyāṃ subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8314: sarvadharmāś ca anena śūnyatāto vyavalokitā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:8315: [Vaidya_222] ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8316: aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8318: yaduta yathāvādī tathākārī ca bhavati, buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhiḥ samanvāhriyate /
S06bsu049_u:8319: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8320: evaṃ carataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya devā apyupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:8324: utsāhaṃ cāsya vardhayiṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /
S06bsu049_u:8325: tasmāttarhi kulaputra anenaiva vihāreṇa vihara yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:8327: etenaiva hi tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharan anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasi,
S06bsu049_u:8337: evaṃ te devaputrāstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyotsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8339: etena hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye te 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8340_0: te 'pi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharatastasya
S06bsu049_u:8340_1: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatasya yaduta prajñāpāramitāviharaṇaguṇaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8341: buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8343: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ahametarhi ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06bsu049_u:8344: śikhino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S06bsu049_u:8345: udānaṃ codānayāmi apareṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06bsu049_u:8346: ya etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:8347: evameva subhūte te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto ye etarhi iha mama buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:8349: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8351: subhūtirāha - kiṃ sarveṣāmeva bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8354: na subhūte sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ [Vaidya_223] deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8356: kiṃ tarhi subhūte ye te 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasaṅgavigatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8357: teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8359: subhūtirāha - santi bhagavan avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā tato 'nye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8360: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8362: bhagavānāha - santi subhūte pratipakṣabalino bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā,
S06bsu049_u:8363: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8366: ye etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:8368_0: ime te subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
S06bsu049_u:8368_1: sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ
S06bsu049_u:8370: ye 'pi te subhūte ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:8372_0: ime 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
S06bsu049_u:8372_1: sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ
S06bsu049_u:8374: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvadharmā anutpattikā ityadhimuñcanti,

S06bsu049_u:8380: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8386_0: yeṣāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ te buddhā
S06bsu049_u:8386_1: bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ na rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8389: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8393: evametadyathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitamityadhimucya vistareṇa śroṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8394: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayiṣyanti - [Vaidya_224] imāṃ vayaṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādvistareṇa śṛṇuyāmeti,
S06bsu049_u:8395: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ ye cāsya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:8397: te 'pyenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmadhimucyamānā yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitā tathā cādhimokṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:8399: evaṃ subhūte bahukaraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇam api vadāmi, kaḥ punarvādo ya enāmadhimokṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8402: tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadya tiṣṭhanti tathatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:8403: tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhantaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti //
S06bsu049_u:8404: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavaṃstathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:8405: tadā ko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ sthāsyati tathatāyām,
S06bsu049_u:8408: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - yadā tathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:8412: na subhūte tathatāvinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate, yo dharmastathatāyāṃ sthāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:8413: tathataiva tāvatsubhūte nopalabhyate, kaḥ punarvādo yastathatāyāṃ sthāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:8420: so 'pi subhūte nopalabhyate, yo dharmo deśyeta //
S06bsu049_u:8421: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:8422: duṣkarakārakā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8424: na ca nāma bhagavan kaściddharmastathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:8427: atra ca te nāvalīyante, nāpi kāṅkṣanti, nāpi dhandhāyante //
S06bsu049_u:8428: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8429: yeṣāmevaṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:8431: sarvadharmeṣu kauśika śūnyeṣu kasyātra kāṅkṣāyitatā vā bhavati dhandhāyitatā vā bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:8435: tadyathāpi nāma antarīkṣe iṣuḥ kṣipto naiva kvacitsajjati,
S06bsu049_u:8437: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kaccidahaṃ bhagavan subhūtiṃ sthaviramārabhya evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavāmi dharmavādī ca,
S06bsu049_u:8439: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkhalu [Vaidya_225] tvaṃ kauśika evaṃ bhāṣase - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:8440: evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavasi dharmavādī ca,
S06bsu049_u:8443: yadyadeva hi kauśika subhūteḥ sthavirasya pratibhāti,
S06bsu049_u:8446: subhūtirhi kauśika sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitām api tāvanna samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:8454: balānyeva tāvannopalabhate, kutaḥ punaryo balasamaṅgī bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8455: vaiśāradyānyeva tāvannopalabhate, kutaḥ punaryo viśārado bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8456: dharmameva tāvannopalabhate, kutaḥ punaryo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8457: sarvadharmaviviktavihāreṇa sarvadharmānupalambhavihāreṇa hi kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviro viharati /
S06bsu049_u:8458: yaḥ khalu punarayaṃ kauśika subhūteḥ sthavirasya sarvadharmaviviktavihāraḥ sarvadharmānupalambhavihāraśca,
S06bsu049_u:8459: eṣa kauśika vihāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharataḥ śatatamīm api kalaṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:8460: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:8461: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:8462: tathāgatavihāraṃ hi kauśika sthāpayitvā tato 'nyān sarvān vihārānabhibhavatyayaṃ vihāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8463: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharato vihāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8476: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharato vihāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8477_0: tasmāttarhi kauśika sarvasattvānāmagratāṃ gantukāmena śreṣṭhatāṃ gantukāmena jyeṣṭhatāṃ
S06bsu049_u:8477_1: gantukāmena varatāṃ gantukāmena pravaratāṃ gantukāmena praṇītatāṃ gantukāmena uttamatāṃ
S06bsu049_u:8477_2: gantukāmena anuttamatāṃ gantukāmena niruttaratāṃ gantukāmena asamatāṃ gantukāmena
S06bsu049_u:8477_3: asamasamatāṃ gantukāmena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā anena vihāreṇa vihartavyam,
S06bsu049_u:8478: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ viharatāṃ vihāra iti //
S06bsu049_u:8483: atha khalu tasmin samaye 'nyataro devaputrastrāyastriṃśairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ māndāravāṇi mahāmāndāravāṇi ca puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8484: ṣaṣṭhaṃ śataṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ tasminneva samaye tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaṃ cābhūt /
S06bsu049_u:8485: te utthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsānyuttarāsaṅgāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayāmāsuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8486: teṣā bhikṣūṇāṃ buddhānubhāvena te 'ñjalipragrahā māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ paripūrṇā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:8490: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - vayaṃ bhagavan asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8491: vayaṃ bhagavan anena anuttareṇa prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihāriṣyāma iti //
S06bsu049_u:8492: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarot /
S06bsu049_u:8493: dharmatā khalu punareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām - yadā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti,
S06bsu049_u:8494: atha tadā nānāvarṇā anekavarṇā raśmayo bhagavato mukhadvārānniścaranti - tadyathā nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhasphaṭikarajatasuvarṇavarṇāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8495: te niścarya anantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā avabhāsya yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhanyantardhīyante //
S06bsu049_u:8496_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S06bsu049_u:8496_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat
S06bsu049_u:8496_2: - nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti /
S06bsu049_u:8497: ko bhagavan hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya?
S06bsu049_u:8498: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - idamānanda bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ śatamanāgate 'dhvani tārakopame kalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06bsu049_u:8501: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ śāstāro loke bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8502: teṣāṃ khalu punarānanda avakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ samaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8503: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmavakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ samamevāyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati viṃśatikalpasahasrāṇi /
S06bsu049_u:8504: sarveṣāmeva caikaikasya vaistārikaṃ pravacanaṃ bhaviṣyati pṛthuvaipulyaprāptaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu /
S06bsu049_u:8505: sarveṣāmeva ca saddharmaḥ samaṃ sthāsyati, viṃśatimeva kalpasahasrāṇyekaikasya /
S06bsu049_u:8506: sarve ca te yato yata eva grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīto 'bhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8508: pravartya ca yatra yatra ca vihariṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8509: yato yataś ca yatra yatraiva ca pravekṣanti,
S06bsu049_u:8510: yena yena ca yato yata eva cābhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8511: tatastatastatra tatra teṣāṃ praviśatāmabhiniṣkrāmatāṃ viharatāṃ ca pañcavarṇikānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ puṣpavarṣāḥ pravartiṣyante /
S06bsu049_u:8512: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvairmahāsattvairuttamena vihāreṇa vihartukāmaiḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa [Vaidya_227] vihartavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8514: ye hi kecidānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8515: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - manuṣyebhya evaite cyutā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8516: te ihopapannāstuṣitebhya eva vā devanikāyebhyaścyutā bhaviṣyanti manuṣyeṣvevopapannāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8517: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi manuṣyeṣu tuṣiteṣu ca deveṣu iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa pracariṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:8518: tathāgatāvalokitāḥ khalu punarānanda te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8521: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8523_0: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya
S06bsu049_u:8523_1: antaśo likhitvā bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavavadiṣyanti anuśāsiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti
S06bsu049_u:8524: avaropitakuśalamūlāste ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāstathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu /
S06bsu049_u:8525: na kevalaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmantike taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum,
S06bsu049_u:8526: niḥsaṃśayaṃ khalu punarānanda tathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8529: ye ca ānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
S06bsu049_u:8531: niṣṭhā ānanda tatra gantavyā - saṃmukhībhūtāste abhūvan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:8540: kiṃcāpyānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike kuśalamūlamavaropitam,
S06bsu049_u:8541: evaṃ hi tanna śrāvakapratyekabuddhatvāya dāsyati vipākam /
S06bsu049_u:8542: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na visaṃvādayiṣyati praṇidhānam,
S06bsu049_u:8543: api tu khalu punarānanda prāyeṇa tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṛtajñena bhavitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatā /
S06bsu049_u:8544_0: tasmāttarhi te ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā
S06bsu049_u:8544_1: akṣarasaṃnipātādudgrahaṇāya dhāraṇāya vācanāya paryavāptaye pravartanāya cirasthitaye
S06bsu049_u:8545: sacettvamānanda yo mayā te dharmo deśitaḥ sākṣāt sthāpayitvā prajñāpāramitām,
S06bsu049_u:8548: na me tvamānanda etāvatā aparāddhaḥ syāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8549: yatkhalu punastvamānanda prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ vā padasāmantakaṃ vā nāśayeḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8558: na mānito na pūjito nārcito nāpacāyitaḥ syām /
S06bsu049_u:8559: ye 'pi [Vaidya_228] te ānanda atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8560: te 'pi tvayā ānanda na satkṛtā na gurukṛtā na mānitā na pūjitā nārcitā nāpacāyitā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:8567: uktametadānanda tathāgatena - prajñāpāramitā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī sarvajñatāyā āhāriketi /
S06bsu049_u:8568: tasmāttarhi ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi te imāṃ prajñāpāramitām, yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta /
S06bsu049_u:8580: sumanasikṛtā ca sudhṛtā ca suparyavāptā ca supravartitā ca tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8583: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakāyateti tāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya /
S06bsu049_u:8584_0: yathā tattvamānanda etarhi me tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya yāpayato hitaiṣitayā
S06bsu049_u:8584_1: premato vā gauravato vā kalyāṇato vā sparśavihārato vā kartavyaṃ vā dātavyaṃ vā samanvāhartavyaṃ vā manyase,
S06bsu049_u:8585_0: tathaiva tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā
S06bsu049_u:8585_1: pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā bhāvayitavyā
S06bsu049_u:8585_2: satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā,
S06bsu049_u:8586: tayā hitaiṣitayā tena premṇā tena gauraveṇa tayā guṇavattayā /
S06bsu049_u:8587: evaṃ tvayā ānanda ahaṃ pūjito bhavāmi, te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8588: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike prema ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ cotpāditaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:8589: yadi te ānanda ahaṃ priyo manaāpo 'parityaktastathāgataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8590: tataste ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā priyā manaāpā aparityajanīyā bhavatu,
S06bsu049_u:8591: yathā te ekapadam api na praṇaśyet,
S06bsu049_u:8593_0: bahv api te ānanda ahaṃ bhāṣeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parīndanāmāramya kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ
S06bsu049_u:8593_1: vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīṃ vā kalpakoṭīśataṃ
S06bsu049_u:8593_2: vā kalpakoṭīsahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā upari /
S06bsu049_u:8594: saṃkṣepeṇa ānanda yādṛśastavāhaṃ śāstā, tādṛśī te prajñāpāramitā śāstā /
S06bsu049_u:8595: yādṛśāste atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya śāstāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8598: aparimāṇayā parīndanayā prajñāpāramitāṃ te parīndāmyanuparīndāmi sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya hitāya sukhāya /
S06bsu049_u:8606: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:8607: yo hi kaścidānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pralujyamānāmanuparigṛhṇīte,
S06bsu049_u:8608: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:8609: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8610: ye 'pi te ānanda abhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8611: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhūt /
S06bsu049_u:8612: te 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8613: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8614: ye 'pi te ānanda aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:8615: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8616_0: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
