S06bsu049_u:8803: teṣām api itonirjātaiva sarvajñatā yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8804: evaṃ samanvāhṛtya tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena punarevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - ahamapyetān dharmānanuprāpsyāmi ye tairbuddhairbhagavadbhiranuprāptā iti /
S06bsu049_u:8805: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā ime cittotpādā utpādayitavyā abhinirhartavyā divasasyātyayena,
S06bsu049_u:8807: yaś ca subhūte aupalambhiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:8809: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divasasyātyayena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhinirharet,
S06bsu049_u:8813: yo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imāṃścittotpādānutpādayati divasasyātyayena [Vaidya_234] antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api /
S06bsu049_u:8815: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā?
S06bsu049_u:8816: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nānyā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8827: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte gandhahastino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ya etarhyakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caratīti //
S06bsu049_u:8832: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā - sarvadharmāsaṅgataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8837: sarvadharmāś ca nāmamātreṇa vyavahāramātreṇābhilapyante iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8838: vyavahāraś ca na kvacinna kutaścinna kaścidvyavahāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8839: sarvadharmā avyavahārā avyāhārā avyavahṛtā avyāhṛtā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8850: sarvadharmā nāgacchanti, na gacchanti, ajānānā ajātā atyantājātita iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8852: sarvadharmā āryārhantaḥ prakṛtipariśuddhā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8855: tatkasya hetoḥ ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte adeśamapradeśaṃ prakṛtisvabhāvataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8857: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte adeśamapradeśaṃ prakṛītisvabhāvataḥ sarvadharmanirodhaprahlādanatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8860: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate /
S06bsu049_u:8862: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate prakṛtipariśuddhatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8863: sarvadharmā asaktāḥ saṅgāsaṅgavigatā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8867: sarvadharmā maitrīvihāriṇaḥ karuṇāvihāriṇo muditāvihāriṇa upekṣāvihāriṇa iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8868: sarvadharmā brahmabhūtā doṣānutpādanataḥ sarvadoṣānutpādanata iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:8893: tatkasya hetoḥ ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte samudrasamam /
S06bsu049_u:8971: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā //
S06bsu049_u:8972: yadāyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmanugamiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:8973: vyavacārayiṣyati avatariṣyati avabhotsyate cintayiṣyati tulayiṣyati upaparīkṣiṣyate bhāvayiṣyati sarvamāyāśāṭhyavivarjitairmanasikāraiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8984: tadā nāsya durlabhā bhaviṣyati sarvaguṇānāṃ paripūriḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8992: ya etarhi bhīṣmagarjitanirghoṣasvarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ carati /
S06bsu049_u:8993: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā?
S06bsu049_u:8994_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sadāpraruditena subhūte bodhisattvena
S06bsu049_u:8994_1: mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa
S06bsu049_u:8995: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt - gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi /
S06bsu049_u:9006: mā ca kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhāḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā /
S06bsu049_u:9015: tathā ca kulaputra gaccha, yathā nātmato na satkāyataścalasi /
S06bsu049_u:9016: yathā na rūpataścalasi, yathā na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārataḥ, yathā na vijñānataścalasi /
S06bsu049_u:9019: yo buddhadharmebhyo vitiṣṭhate, sa saṃsāre carati /
S06bsu049_u:9020: yaḥ saṃsāre carati, sa na carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:9022: evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ nirghoṣametadavocat - evaṃ vai kariṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:9023: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahaṃ hi sarvasattvānāmālokaṃ kartukāmo buddhadharmān samudānetukāma iti /
S06bsu049_u:9024: evamukte sa nirghoṣaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra sadāprarudita //
S06bsu049_u:9025: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar api śabdamaśrauṣīt /
S06bsu049_u:9026: evaṃ cāśrauṣīt - śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu ca tvayā kulaputra sarvadharmeṣvadhimuktimutpādya prajñāpāramitā paryeṣṭavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9027: nimittaparivarjitena bhāvaparivarjitena sattvadṛṣṭiparivarjitena ca tvayā bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:9029: kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca tvayā sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni,
S06bsu049_u:9030: yāni ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānutpādājātāniruddhābhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S06bsu049_u:9031: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra pratipadyamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi pustakagatāṃ vā dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ kāyagatām /
S06bsu049_u:9032: yasya ca tvaṃ kulaputra antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāḥ śāstṛsaṃjñā tvayā tatrotpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9033: kṛtajñena ca tvayā bhavitavyaṃ kṛtavedinā ca - eṣa mama kalyāṇamitraṃ yasyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantikācchṛṇomi /
S06bsu049_u:9034: yāmahaṃ śṛṇvan [Vaidya_239] kṣiprameva avinivartanīyo bhaviṣyāmyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9039: imāstvayā kulaputra anuśaṃsāḥ paritulayamānena dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau śāstṛsaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9040: na ca tvayā kulaputra lokāmiṣapratisaṃyuktayā cittasaṃtatyā dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9041: dharmārthikena ca tvayā dharmagauraveṇa dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9043: asti hi kulaputra māraḥ pāpīyān dharmabhāṇakasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpaśabdagandharasasparśānupasaṃharati sevituṃ bhaktuṃ paryupāsitum /
S06bsu049_u:9045: tatra ca tvayā kulaputra dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau nāprasādacittamutpādayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:9046: api tvevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - nāhaṃ tadupāyakauśalyaṃ jāne, yadeṣa upāyakauśalyaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:9047: eṣa sattvavinayena sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlaparigrahamupādāya enān dharmān pratisevate bhajate paryupāste /
S06bsu049_u:9048: na hi kvacidbodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṅgo vā ārambaṇaṃ vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:9049: tatkṣaṇaṃ ca tvayā kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9050: katamaś ca kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaḥ? yaduta sarvadharmā asaṃkleśā avyavadānāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9051: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi svabhāvena śūnyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9052: sarvadharmā hi niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9053: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmabhāṇakamanubadhnan nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niryāsyasi /
S06bsu049_u:9054: aparam api tvaṃ kulaputra mārakarma samanvāhareḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9057: tatra tvayā kulaputra na prativāṇiḥ kartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9058: api tu dharmārthikenaiva dharmagauraveṇaiva anirviṇṇamānasena dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:9059: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya nirghoṣasyāntikādimāmanuśāsanīṃ pratigṛhya yena pūrvā dik tena pratikrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:9060: aciraprakrāntasya cāsyaitadabhūt - na mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:9062: tatra rudan krandan śocan paridevamānaḥ evaṃ cintayati sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe ekaṃ vā rātriṃdivamatināmayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:9077: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ ekaputrake kālagate mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgato 'bhavat,
S06bsu049_u:9080: evameva subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasmin [Vaidya_240] samaye nānyaḥ kaścinmanasikāraḥ pravartate sma,
S06bsu049_u:9081: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmīti //
S06bsu049_u:9082: atha khalu subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathotkaṇṭhitasya tathāgatavigrahaḥ purataḥ sthitvā sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu049_u:9084: evaṃ hi kulaputra paurvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā,
S06bsu049_u:9086: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra etenaiva vīryeṇa etenaivotsāhenaṃ etayaivārthikatayā etayaiva cchandikatayā anubadhya pūrvāmeva diśaṃ gaccha /
S06bsu049_u:9087: asti kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairgandhavatī nāma nagarī saptaratnamayī,
S06bsu049_u:9092_0: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca pañcabhirantarāpaṇavīthiśatairālekhyavicitrasadṛśairdarśanīyairnirviddhā
S06bsu049_u:9093: samantataḥ prākārāś ca tasyā nagaryāḥ saptaratnamayāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9094: teṣāṃ ca saptaratnamayānāṃ prākārāṇāṃ jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya khoḍakaśīrṣāṇi pramāṇavantyupodgatāni /
S06bsu049_u:9095: sarvasmiṃś ca khoḍakaśīrṣe saptaratnamayo vṛkṣo jāto nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ phalaiḥ phalavān /
S06bsu049_u:9096: sarvataś ca khoḍakavṛkṣādratnamayaṃ sūtraṃ dvitīyaṃ khoḍakavṛkṣāntaramavasaktam /
S06bsu049_u:9097: sarvāvatī ca sā nagarī sauvarṇena kiṅkiṇījālena praticchannā /
S06bsu049_u:9098: tasya ca kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteneritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyaḥ śabdo niścarati /
S06bsu049_u:9099: tadyathāpi nāma pañcāṅgikasya tūryasya sametya saṃgītyāṃ kuśalairgandharvaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:9100: evameva tasya kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati /
S06bsu049_u:9101: tena ca śabdena te sattvāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:9102: samantācca tasyā nagaryāḥ parikhā vāriparipūrṇā anusārivārivāhinyo vāriṇo nātiśītasya nātyuṣṇasya pūrṇāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9103: tasmiṃś ca vāriṇi nāvaḥ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ vicitrā darśanīyāsteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ pūrvakarmavipākenābhinirvṛttāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9104: yāsu te sattvā abhiruhya krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:9106: anyaiś ca abhijātābhijātaiḥ sugandhagandhibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ saṃchāditam /
S06bsu049_u:9107: nāsti sā kācittrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau puṣpajātiryā tatra nāsti /
S06bsu049_u:9112: sarvāsu tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu saptaratnamayāni vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇi jātāni,
S06bsu049_u:9114: sarvāṇi ca tānyutpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāni śakaṭacakrapramāṇapariṇāhāni sugandhāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni,
S06bsu049_u:9121: yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatāṃ buddhanetrīcitrīkārānugatasugataśrutacittānāṃ sattvānāṃ dīrgharātraṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktānām /
S06bsu049_u:9122: tatra ca kulaputra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ madhyeśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gṛhaṃ yojanaṃ samantāt /
S06bsu049_u:9127: aśokaṃ ca nāma śokavigataṃ ca nāma puṣpacitraṃ ca nāmodyānam /
S06bsu049_u:9128: ekaikasmiṃścodyāne 'ṣṭāvaṣṭau puṣkariṇyo yaduta bhadrā ca nāma,
S06bsu049_u:9134: niyatā ca nāma, avivāhā ca nāma /
S06bsu049_u:9135: tāsāṃ ca khalu puṣkariṇīnāmekaṃ pārśvaṃ sauvarṇamayaṃ dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ rūpyamayaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pārśvaṃ vaidūryamayaṃ caturthaṃ pārśvaṃ sphaṭikamayam /
S06bsu049_u:9137: ekaikasyāṃ ca puṣkariṇyāmaṣṭāvaṣṭau sopānāni nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ sopānaphalakaiḥ pratimaṇḍitāni /
S06bsu049_u:9138: sarvasmiṃś ca sopānaphalakavivarāntare jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya kadalīvṛkṣo jātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9140: samantācca tāsāṃ puṣkariṇīnāṃ nānācitrāḥ puṣpavṛkṣā jātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9141: teṣāṃ puṣpavṛkṣāṇāṃ vāteneritāni puṣpāṇi puṣkariṇīṣu patanti /
S06bsu049_u:9142: sarvāsu ca tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu candanagandhikaṃ vāri, varṇopetaṃ rasopetaṃ sparśopetam /
S06bsu049_u:9143: tatra ca dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saparivāro 'ṣṭaṣaṣṭayā strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati / ye 'pi
S06bsu049_u:9146: te 'pi sarve nityapramuditā udyāneṣu puṣkariṇīṣu ca pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:9147: sa khalu punardharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa tāvatkālaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati,
S06bsu049_u:9149: ye 'pi te sattvāstatra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ vāstavyāḥ te 'pi madhyenagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya āsanaṃ prajñapayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9150: suvarṇapādakaṃ vā rūpyapādakaṃ vā vaiḍūryapādakaṃ vā sphaṭikapādakaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:9155: upariṣṭāccāntarīkṣe cailavitānaṃ muktāvicitritaṃ samaṃ sahitā niratāḥ kimayaṃ saṃsthita iti susaṃsthitavicitravipākatayā dhārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:9156: samantācca taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ pañcavarṇikaiḥ kusumairabhyavakiranti saṃpravikiranti /
S06bsu049_u:9158: yathāpīdaṃ dharmāśayaviśuddhyā tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmagauraveṇa ca /
S06bsu049_u:9159: tatra dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣaṇṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayati /
S06bsu049_u:9160_0: evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra dharmagauraveṇa dharmāṇāṃ saṃniśrayatayā [Vaidya_242] śraddheyaśraddadhānatayā
S06bsu049_u:9160_1: śraddhotpādanena te sattvā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvanti /
S06bsu049_u:9161: tatra ca bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ śṛṇvanti /
S06bsu049_u:9163: sarvaṃ ca te sattvā avinipātadharmāṇo 'vinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9164: tasya tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ gaccha /
S06bsu049_u:9166: sa hi tava kulaputra dīrgharātraṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃdarśakaḥ samādāpakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣako 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9167: tenāpi kulaputra pūrvamevaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā, yathā tvametarhi paryeṣase /
S06bsu049_u:9168: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra rātriṃdivamadhiṣṭhitamanasikāramutpādayamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi //
S06bsu049_u:9169: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ idaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:9170: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣaḥ saviṣeṇa śalyena viddho nānyaṃ manasikāramutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:9171: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ śalyahartāraṃ vaidyaṃ lapsye yo mamedaṃ śalyamuddhariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:9173: evameva sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye nānyaṃ kaṃciddharmaṃ manasi karoti,
S06bsu049_u:9174: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ taṃ kulaputraṃ drakṣyāmi yo māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrāvayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:9175: yanmama dharmaṃ śrutvā upalambhamanasikārāḥ prahāsyanta iti //
S06bsu049_u:9176: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe sthitaḥ tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayataḥ śṛṇoti sma /
S06bsu049_u:9241: sa eṣu samādhiṣu sthitaḥ san daśadiśi loke buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ prakāśayato bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9242: te ca tathāgatāḥ sādhukāraṃ dadati sma, svāsanaṃ cāsya kurvanti sma /
S06bsu049_u:9243: evaṃ cāvocan - asmābhir api kulaputra pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhirevameva prajñāpāramitā parigaveṣitā /
S06bsu049_u:9244: parigaveṣamāṇaiś ca ete eva samādhayaḥ pratilabdhāḥ, ye tvayaitarhi pratilabdhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9245: enāṃś ca samādhīn pratilabhya gatiṃgatāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9247: te vayameteṣāmeva samādhīnāṃ prakṛtiṃ svabhāvaṃ vyavalokayantastaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmo yaḥ samāpadyate vā vyuttiṣṭhate vā,
S06bsu049_u:9250: iyaṃ sā kulaputra prajñāpāramitā, yā na kenaciddharmeṇa manyamānatā /
S06bsu049_u:9257: sarvabuddhadharmaguṇapāramitā ca anuprāptā yasyā guṇapāramitāyā na śakyaṃ tathāgataireva tāvatpramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ paryanto vā nidarśayitum,
S06bsu049_u:9259: tasmāttarhi kulaputra eteṣveva tvayā dharmeṣu gauravamutpādayitavyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā arthikatayā chandikatayā ca /
S06bsu049_u:9260: arthikasya hi kulaputra chandikasya ca na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9261: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravamutpādayitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:9264: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣiprameva anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante //
S06bsu049_u:9265: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃstathāgatānetadavocat - ko 'smākaṃ kalyāṇamitramiti?
S06bsu049_u:9266: ta enametadavocan - dīrgharātraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ parigṛhītaś ca /
S06bsu049_u:9268: sa tava kulaputra parigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:9269: tattvayā kṛtajñatayā kṛtaveditayā ca satkṛtya tatkṛtaṃ dhārayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:9270_0: sacettvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ [Vaidya_244] mahāsattvamekaṃ vā kalpaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9270_1: dvau vā kalpau trīn vā kalpān kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā
S06bsu049_u:9270_2: tato vā uttare cailoṇḍukamiva śirasā parikarṣeḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9274: evam api tvayā kulaputra tasya kulaputrasya naiva kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:9276: tasya hi kulaputra kulaputrasya anubhāvena tavaiṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ samādhīnāṃ pratilambhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9278: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samāśvāsya antarhitā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:9280: vyutthitasya cāsya etadabhūt - kutaste tathāgatāḥ, kva vā te tathāgatā iti /
S06bsu049_u:9282: tasyaitadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ mama saṃparigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:9284: yannvahametamarthaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhigamyopasaṃkramya paripṛccheyam - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9285: kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti //
S06bsu049_u:9286: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgate bodhisattve mahāsattve prema ca prasādaṃ ca citrīkāraṃ ca gauravaṃ ca upasthāpayati /
S06bsu049_u:9287: upasthāpya evaṃ prācintayat - kiyadrūpayā nu khalvahaṃ satkriyayā taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam? daridraścāsmi /
S06bsu049_u:9288_0: na ca me kiṃcittathārūpaṃ vastraṃ vā ratnaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā maṇayo vā muktā vā vaidūryaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9288_1: vā śaṅkhaśilā vā pravālaṃ vā rajataṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpo vā gandho vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9288_2: vā cūrṇaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭā vā patākā vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:9289: kenāhaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryām?
S06bsu049_u:9293: na ca me prītirvā prāmodhaṃ votpadyate //
S06bsu049_u:9294: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpairguṇairgauravamanasikārairgacchan anupūrveṇa anyataraṃ nagaramanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:9295: tatra tasyāntarāpaṇamadhyagatasya etadabhūt - yannvahamimamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya tena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kuryām /
S06bsu049_u:9296: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahasrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni niruddhāni vikrītāni /
S06bsu049_u:9297: punaḥ punaraparimāṇe saṃsāre aparimāṇāni ca nirayaduḥkhāni mayā kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānamanubhūtāni /
S06bsu049_u:9298: na punarevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśa evaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā sattvānāṃ satkārāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:9299: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvontarāpaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdamanuśrāvayāmāsa,
S06bsu049_u:9303: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhūt - ayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmakāmatayā yadyātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:9304: [Vaidya_245] prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca pariprakṣyati - kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariniṣpatsyate iti,
S06bsu049_u:9306: adhṛṣyaś ca bhaviṣyati māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9309: tāṃś ca mama viṣayādatikrāmayiṣyati anyāṃś ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya /
S06bsu049_u:9311: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃstān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃstathā pratyutthāpayāmāsa,
S06bsu049_u:9312: yathā te taṃ ghoṣaṃ nāśrauṣuḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya - kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9315: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā ātmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate,
S06bsu049_u:9318: evaṃ cāvocat - aho batāsmākaṃ durlabdhā lābhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9319: ye vayamātmabhāvasyāpi krāyakaṃ na labhāmahe - yadvayamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmeti //
S06bsu049_u:9320_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - yannvahaṃ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9320_1: mahāsattvaṃ tulayeyam - kiṃ nvayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyāśayapratipanna
S06bsu049_u:9321: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamabhinirmāya yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9323: upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dīnadīnamanā utkaṇṭhitamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:9326: taṃ māṇavakarūpī śakra āha - kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāya ātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:9327: sadāpraruditastamāha - ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayā imamātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9332: yena taṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjāṃ kuryām,
S06bsu049_u:9333: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:9334: atha khalu māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam /
S06bsu049_u:9335: api tu khalu punaḥ piturbhe yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9336: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena kṛtyam, lohitena ca asthimajjayā ca /
S06bsu049_u:9338: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9339: pariniṣpannaṃ cātmabhāvaṃ jāne prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalye buddhadharmeṣu ca,
S06bsu049_u:9340: yanmayāyaṃ māṇavakaḥ krāyako labdhaḥ hṛdayasya rudhirasya ca asthimajjāyāśceti /
S06bsu049_u:9341: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittastaṃ māṇavakametadavocat - dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena yenaiva te iti ātmabhāvādarthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9342: sa tametadavocat - kiṃ te kulaputra mūlyaṃ dadāmi?
S06bsu049_u:9343: sa tametadavocat - yatte māṇavaka parityaktam, taddehīti /
S06bsu049_u:9344: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:9345: dakṣiṇaṃ coruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:9347: sā adrākṣītsadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā rudhiraṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntam /
S06bsu049_u:9348: tasyā etadabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ kulaputra ātmanaivātmanaḥ īdṛśīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayati?
S06bsu049_u:9350: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntā /
S06bsu049_u:9351: upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputra evaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayasi?
S06bsu049_u:9352: kiṃ cānena rudhireṇa kariṣyasi tvamasthimajjābhyāṃ ca?
S06bsu049_u:9353: sadāprarudita āha - asya dārike māṇavakasyāntike idaṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:9354: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi //
S06bsu049_u:9355: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvatadavocat - kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirniṣpatsyate guṇaviśeṣo vā,
S06bsu049_u:9356: yattvamātmano hṛdayaṃ rudhiraṃ cāsthimajjānaṃ ca vikrīya taṃ kulaputraṃ satkartukāmaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:9357: sa tāṃ dārikāmetadavocat - sa dārike kulaputro 'smākaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:9359: tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9360: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya suvarṇavarṇaṃ ca kāyaṃ pratilapsyāmahe /
S06bsu049_u:9361: dvātriṃśacca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītiṃ cānuvyañjanāni vyāmaprabhatāṃ ca anantaraśmitāṃ ca mahāmaitrī ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca mahāmuditāṃ ca mahopekṣāṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:9371: anuttaraṃ ca dharmaratnaṃ pratilapsyāmahe, yena ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāma iti //
S06bsu049_u:9372: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - āścaryaṃ kulaputra yāvadudārāḥ praṇītāścāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrtitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9373: ekaikasyāpi tāvatkulaputra evaṃrūpasya dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān api kalpānātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9375: tathodārāḥ praṇītāścāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrtitāḥ, yathā mamāpyete rocante kṣamante ca /
S06bsu049_u:9376: api nu khalu punaḥ kulaputra yena yenaivārthena te kṛtyam,
S06bsu049_u:9377_0: tattatte dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā maṇīn vā muktāṃ vā rajataṃ vā vaidūryaṃ vā musāragalvaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9377_1: vā lohitārkaṃ vā sphāṭikaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ va vilepanaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9377_2: vā cūrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:9378: tena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi /
S06bsu049_u:9379: mā ca ātmana imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9380: vayam api tvayaiva sārdhaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ, yenāryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9383: [Vaidya_247] atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamantardhāpayitvā svakenātmabhāvena sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato 'sthāt,
S06bsu049_u:9386_0: evaṃrūpayā ca dharmārthikatayā pūrvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ
S06bsu049_u:9386_1: pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paripṛcchadbhiranuttarā
S06bsu049_u:9391: api tu khalu punarahaṃ tvāmeva mīmāṃsitukāma ihāgataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9393: kiyadrūpaṃ te varaṃ dāsyāmīti? sa tāmāha - anuttarān me śakra buddhadharmān dehīti /
S06bsu049_u:9394: devendra āha - na mamātra kulaputra viṣaye viṣayitā /
S06bsu049_u:9397: sadāprarudita āha - alpotsukastvaṃ devendra bhava atra sthāne mamātmabhāvaparipūrimupādāya /
S06bsu049_u:9401: tena devendra satyena satyavacanena mama yathāpaurāṇo 'yamātmabhāvo bhavatu /
S06bsu049_u:9402: atha khalu tatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhānubhāvena āśayapariśuddhyā ca yathāpaurāṇo 'sya kāyaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:9404: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māraś ca pāpīyān niṣpratibhānaḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyottare pratibhānamapratipadyamānastatraivāntarhito 'bhūt //
S06bsu049_u:9405: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:9409: taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi,
S06bsu049_u:9411: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ tayā śreṣṭhadārikayā yenāsyāḥ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:9413_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā svakaṃ niveśanaṃ praviśya svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caitadavocat
S06bsu049_u:9413_1: - amba tāta daddhvaṃ hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇaṃ ratnāni maṇīn vastrāṇi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9415: mām api sārdhamebhiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśatairyā mamopasthāyikā yuṣmabhireva dattāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9416: gamiṣyāmyaham api sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ tasya pūjārthaṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:9419: atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām - kaḥ punareṣa dārike sadāprarudito nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9422: eṣa ca kulaputro 'dhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9425: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9427: alabhamānaḥ san duḥkhito durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamanā aśrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9428: sa śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāyoktaḥ - kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra duḥkhī durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthita iti?
S06bsu049_u:9431: māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha - kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāyātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:9433: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayā /
S06bsu049_u:9434: tatra pratibaddhāś ca me buddhadharmā iti /
S06bsu049_u:9435: māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha - na mama kulaputra tvayārthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9436: api tu khalu punaḥ piturme yajño bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:9437: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena rūdhireṇa asthimajjābhyāṃ ca kṛtyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:9439: sa tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā ātmano bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ ca nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntaḥ ekānte sthitvā asthi bhittvā majjānaṃ ca dāsyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:9441: tasyā mamaitadabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ puruṣa ātmanaivātmana evaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayatīti?
S06bsu049_u:9442: tamenamahamupasaṃkramyaivamavocam - kimarthaṃ tvayā kulaputra ātmanaivātmana evaṃ kṣaradrūdhiraṃ śarīraṃ vikṛtaṃ kṛtam?
S06bsu049_u:9443: tata eṣa māmevamāha - asya dārike māṇavakasya lohitaṃ hṛdayamasthi majjānaṃ ca dāsyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:9446: tamenamahamevamavocam - kiṃ punastvaṃ tena dhanena kariṣyasīti?
S06bsu049_u:9448: taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayeti /
S06bsu049_u:9449: tamenamahamevamavocam - kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirbhaviṣyati guṇaviśeṣo veti?
S06bsu049_u:9450: tataḥ so 'cintyān me buddhaguṇān varṇayati saṃprakāśayati,
S06bsu049_u:9451: aprameyāṃś ca buddhadharmān - eṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ me tata āgamo bhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:9452: tasya me mahattaraṃ prītiprāmodyamutpannaṃ tānacintyān buddhaguṇān śrutvā /
S06bsu049_u:9453: evaṃ ca me 'bhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkarakārakaścāyaṃ kulaputro 'tīva dharmakāmaśca,
S06bsu049_u:9455: ayaṃ hi nāma kulaputro dharmakāmatayā ātmānaṃ parityajati /
S06bsu049_u:9457: evaṃrūpeṣu ca sthāneṣu praṇidhānaṃ na kartavyaṃ syāt,
S06bsu049_u:9458: yeṣāmasmākaṃ prabhūtā vipulāś ca bhogāḥ saṃvidyante iti /
S06bsu049_u:9459: sāhamenaṃ kulaputrametadavocam - mā mā tvaṃ kulaputra imāmevaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9460: ahaṃ te prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ dhanamanupradāpayiṣyāmi yena tavārthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9461: tena tvaṃ tamāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi gurukariṣyasi /
S06bsu049_u:9462: aham api tvayaiva sārdhaṃ yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramiṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:9463: aham api tasya kulaputrasya pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:9464: vayamapyevaṃrūpān dharmānniṣpādayiṣyāmo yaduta anuttarān buddhadharmān ye tvayā parikīrtitā iti /
S06bsu049_u:9467: yenāhametenaiva kulaputreṇa sārdhaṃ gatvā āryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ pūjayiṣyāmi //
S06bsu049_u:9468: [Vaidya_249] atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām - āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkaraṃ ca tvametasya kulaputrasya sthānamācakṣe /
S06bsu049_u:9474: yadāvām api gacchāvastvayaiva sārdhaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ pūjayituṃ ca //
S06bsu049_u:9475_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9475_1: satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitāṃ svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca viditvā etadavocat - amba tāta
S06bsu049_u:9477: ityuktvā evaṃ sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitā babhūva //
S06bsu049_u:9478: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkārayāmāsa /
S06bsu049_u:9480_0: alaṃkṛtya nānāvarṇāni vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā nānāraṅgāṇi vastrāṇi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś
S06bsu049_u:9480_1: ca gṛhītvā nānāratnāni ca vicitrāṇi nānāratnamayāni ca vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā
S06bsu049_u:9480_2: prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ svādanīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā ekaṃ rathaṃ sadāpraruditena
S06bsu049_u:9480_3: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhamabhiruhya taiḥ pañcabhī rathaśataiḥ pañcadārikāśatābhirūḍhaiḥ
S06bsu049_u:9480_4: parivṛttā puraskṛtā mahatā ca parivāreṇa mātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamā yena pūrvā dik tena prakrāntā /
S06bsu049_u:9481_0: anupūrveṇa ca gacchan sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'drākṣīddūrādeva tāṃ gandhavatīṃ
S06bsu049_u:9481_1: nagarīṃ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ citrāṃ darśanīyāṃ saptabhiḥ prākāraiḥ saptaratnamayairanuparikṣiptāṃ
S06bsu049_u:9481_3: yojanāni vistāreṇa dvādaśa yojanānyāyāmena ṛddhāṃ sphītāṃ ca kṣemāṃ ca subhikṣāṃ
S06bsu049_u:9482_0: madhye ca nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya adrākṣīddharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmāsanagatamanekaśatayā
S06bsu049_u:9482_1: parṣadā anekasahasrayā anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛttaṃ puraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam /
S06bsu049_u:9483: sahadarśanenaiva ca tasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ saṃpratilabhate sma tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpanno bhikṣurekāgreṇa manasikāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:9484: dṛṣṭvā cāsya etadabhūt - na mama pratirūpametadbhavet,
S06bsu049_u:9485: yadahaṃ rathagata eva dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam /
S06bsu049_u:9488: tāny api pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikayā saha rathebhyo 'vateruḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9489_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ
S06bsu049_u:9489_1: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'parimāṇapūjāvyūhena yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06bsu049_u:9490: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ saptaratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kāritamabhūt lohitacandanālaṃkṛtaṃ muktājālaparikṣiptam /
S06bsu049_u:9491: caturṣu kūṭāgārakoṇeṣu maṇiratnāni sthāpitāni, yāni pradīpakṛtyaṃ kurvanti sma /
S06bsu049_u:9493: yatra śuddhaṃ kṛṣṇāguru dhūpyate sma yaduta prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārtham /
S06bsu049_u:9494: tasya ca kūṭāgārasya madhye saptaratnamayaḥ paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:9496: yatra prajñāpāramitā prakṣiptā suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu likhitā vilīnena vaidūryeṇa /
S06bsu049_u:9498: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcadārikāśataiḥ taṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīdaparimāṇena pūjāvyūhena pratimaṇḍitam /
S06bsu049_u:9500: śakraṃ ca devānāmindraṃ divyairmāndāravapuṣpairdivyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca suvarṇacūrṇairdivyaiś ca rūpyacūrṇaistaṃ kūṭāgāramavakirantamabhyavakirantamabhiprakirantam /
S06bsu049_u:9502_0: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat
S06bsu049_u:9502_1: - kimarthaṃ tvaṃ devendra anekairdevatāsahasraiḥ sārdhamidaṃ ratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ
S06bsu049_u:9503: imāni ca divyāni vādyāni devairuparyantarīkṣe pravāditāni?
S06bsu049_u:9504: evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvaṃ kulaputra jānīṣe?
S06bsu049_u:9505: eṣā hi sā prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā pariṇāyikā,
S06bsu049_u:9506: yatra śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaguṇapāramitānugatān sarvabuddhadharmān sarvākārajñatāṃ ca kṣipramanuprāpnuvantīti /
S06bsu049_u:9507: evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kvāsau kauśika prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:9509_0: śakra āha - eṣā kulaputra asya kūṭāgārasya madhye suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu vilīnena vaidūryeṇa
S06bsu049_u:9509_1: likhitvā āryeṇa dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saptabhirmudrābhirmudrayitvā sthāpitā /
S06bsu049_u:9511: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhai pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ samagrībhūtaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9512: yānyanena puṣpāṇi gṛhītāni mālyadāmāni ca vastraratnāni ca dhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś ca suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:9514: anyatarānyataraṃ ca tataḥ pratyaṃśaṃ sthāpayāmāsuḥ yaduta dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkārāya //
S06bsu049_u:9515_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
S06bsu049_u:9515_2: ca puṣpairdivyaiś ca vādyaiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūrvaṃ pūjayitvā yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo
S06bsu049_u:9516: divyāni ca vādyāni saṃpravādayati sma dharmapūjāmevopādāya //
S06bsu049_u:9517: atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopariṣṭānmūrdhni puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ prātiṣṭhan /
S06bsu049_u:9518: tāni ca nānāvarṇāni puṣpāṇi suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi [Vaidya_251] vihāyasi vitānamiva sthitāni /
S06bsu049_u:9519: tāny api cīvarāṇi vastraratnāni ca antarīkṣe nānāratnamayo 'bhramaṇḍapa iva saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:9520: adrākṣītkhalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyedamevaṃrūpamṛddhiprātihāryam /
S06bsu049_u:9521: dṛṣṭvā ca punareṣāmetadabhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvanmaharddhikaścāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvanmahānubhāvo yāvanmahaujaskaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9524_0: atha khalu tāni śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamāni pañca dārikāśatāni dharmodgate bodhisattve
S06bsu049_u:9524_1: mahāsattve spṛhāmutpādya sarvāstāḥ samagrībhūtā adhyāśayena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06bsu049_u:9525: evaṃ cāvocan - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhavema /
S06bsu049_u:9526: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca vayaṃ carantya eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema,
S06bsu049_u:9527: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lābhī /
S06bsu049_u:9529: yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkaroti gurukaroti /
S06bsu049_u:9530: bahujanasya ca saṃprakāśayema yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprakāśayati /
S06bsu049_u:9531: evameva ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgatā bhavema /
S06bsu049_u:9532: pariniṣpadyemahi ca yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ pariniṣpannaś ca //
S06bsu049_u:9533_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
S06bsu049_u:9533_1: dārikāśatāni prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayitvā dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkṛtya
S06bsu049_u:9533_2: dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sagauravāḥ
S06bsu049_u:9534_0: ekānte sthitaś ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9534_1: mahāsattvametadavocat - ihāhaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ gaveṣamāṇo 'raṇyagato nirghoṣamaśrauṣam
S06bsu049_u:9536: so 'haṃ samyak taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yena pūrvā dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9537: tasya me etadabhūt - samyak ca mayā nirghoṣaḥ śrutaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9538: na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam,
S06bsu049_u:9539: kasya vā antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmi lapsye veti /
S06bsu049_u:9541: so 'haṃ tena daurmanasyena mahatīmutkaṇṭhāṃ paritapanaṃ cāpanno 'bhūvam /
S06bsu049_u:9544: api tu prajñāpāramitāmeva manasi karomi - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam,
S06bsu049_u:9546: na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ iti /
S06bsu049_u:9548: sa māmevamāha - gaccha kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairanupūrveṇa gandhavatī nāma nagarī /
S06bsu049_u:9549: tatra drakṣyasi dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayantaṃ prakāśayantamiti /
S06bsu049_u:9551: so 'haṃ tenaiva mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena sphuṭastataḥ pṛthivīpradeśānna calitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9553: tasya me śṛṇvato bahūni samādhimukhāni prādurbhūtāni /
S06bsu049_u:9554: [Vaidya_252] tatra sthitaṃ māṃ daśadiglokadhātusthitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samāśvāsayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9555: sādhukāraṃ ca dadati - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu049_u:9558: te māṃ tathāgatāḥ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya antarhitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9560: tasya me etadabhūt - kuto nu te tathāgatā āgatāḥ, kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti?
S06bsu049_u:9561: tasya ca me etadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinākṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9563: sa me enamarthaṃ yathāvadvicariṣyati, yataste tathāgatā āgatā yatra vā te tathāgatā gatā iti /
S06bsu049_u:9564: so 'haṃ tasya tathāgatavigrahasya nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yathānuśiṣṭaṃ yena pūrvāṃ dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9568: so 'haṃ tvāṃ kulaputra pṛcchāmi - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ, kutra te tathāgatā gatā iti?
S06bsu049_u:9569: deśaya me kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:9570: yathā vayaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca jānīma,
S06bsu049_u:9576: evamukte dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattva mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kutaścidāgacchanti vā gacchanti vā /
S06bsu049_u:9579: na hi kulaputra anutpāda āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:9581: na hi kulaputra bhūtakoṭyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:9583: na hi kulaputra śūnyatāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:9585: na hi kulaputra yathāvattāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:9587: na hi kulaputra virāgasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:9589: na hi kulaputra nirodhasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:9591: na hi kulaputra ākāśadhātorāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:9593: na hi kulaputra anyatra ebhyo dharmebhyastathāgataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9594: yā ca kulaputra eṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06bsu049_u:9602: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse 'bhigate madhyāhnakālasamaye marīcikāṃ paśyet syandamānām /
S06bsu049_u:9603: sa tena tena pradhāvet - atrodakaṃ pāsyāmi, apānīyaṃ pāsyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:9604: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kuta etadudakamāgataṃ kva vā tadudakaṃ gacchati,
S06bsu049_u:9605: pūrvaṃ vā mahāsamudraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ vā paścimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā?
S06bsu049_u:9606: sadāprarudita āha - na hi kulaputra marīcikāyāmudakaṃ saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:9607: kiṃ punarasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate?
S06bsu049_u:9608: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyo marīcikāṃ dṛṣṭvā anudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:9611: evameva kulaputra ye kecittathāgatarūpeṇa vā ghoṣeṇa vā abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9612: te tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:9613: ye ca tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9614: sarve te bālajātīyā duṣprajñajātīyā iti vaktavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9615: tadyathāpi nāma sa eva puruṣo yo 'nudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:9616: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi tathāgato rūpakāyato draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9618: na ca kulaputra dharmatā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:9619: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:9620: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra māyākāranirmitasya hastikāyasya vā aśvakāyasya vā rathakāyasya vā pattikāyasya vā nāstyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:9621: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:9622: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragata ekaṃ vā tathāgataṃ paśyet,
S06bsu049_u:9623: dvau vā trīn vā caturo vā pañca vā ṣaḍvā sapta vā aṣṭau vā nava vā daśa vā viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā, tato vā uttare /
S06bsu049_u:9624: sa prativibuddhaḥ san ekam api tathāgataṃ na paśyet /
S06bsu049_u:9625: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti?
S06bsu049_u:9626: sadāprarudita āha - na khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapne kasyaciddharmasya [Vaidya_254] pariniṣpattiḥ prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:9628: dharmodgata āha - evameva kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamā uktā bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:9629: ye kecitkulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmāṃstathāgatena nirdeśitān yathābhūtaṃ na prajānanti,
S06bsu049_u:9630: te tathāgatān nāmakāyena vā rūpakāyena vā abhiniviśya tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:9631: yathāpi nāma dharmatāmaprajānanto ye ca tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9633: sarve te ṣaḍgatikaṃ saṃsāraṃ gatāḥ, gacchanti gamiṣyanti ca /
S06bsu049_u:9636: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmān svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti tathāgatena deśitān yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti,
S06bsu049_u:9637: na te kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9639: ye ca na kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9642: ye ca tathāgataṃ dharmatayā prajānanti, na te tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:9643: ye ca tathāgatasyedṛśīṃ dharmatāṃ prajānanti, te āsannā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheścaranti /
S06bsu049_u:9645: te ca bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ amoghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjate /
S06bsu049_u:9647: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudre ratnāni na pūrvasyā diśa āgacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:9651: na vidigbhyo nādhastānnopariṣṭānna kutaściddeśebhyo digbhya āgacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:9652: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyupādāya mahāsamudre ratnānyutpadyante /
S06bsu049_u:9655: nirudhyamānāni ca tāni ratnāni ca kvaciddaśadiśi loke saṃkrāmanti /
S06bsu049_u:9656: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ tāni ratnāni prabhāvyante,
S06bsu049_u:9657: teṣāṃ pratyayānāmasatāṃ na teṣāṃ ratnānāṃ prabhāvanā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:9658: evameva kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kāyapariniṣpattirna kutaściddaśadiśi lokādāgatā,
S06bsu049_u:9660: na ca ahetuko buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9663: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ kāyābhiniṣpattirbhavati,
S06bsu049_u:9665: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vīṇāyāḥ śabda utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
S06bsu049_u:9669_0: tadyathāpi nāma droṇīṃ ca pratītya carma ca pratītya tantrīś ca pratītya daṇḍaṃ ca
S06bsu049_u:9669_1: pratītya upadhānīś ca pratītya koṇaṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya ca tajjavyāyāmaṃ pratītya
S06bsu049_u:9669_2: evamayaṃ vīṇāyāḥ śabdo niścarati hetvadhīnaḥ pratyayādhīnaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9670: sa ca śabdo na droṇyā niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:9671: na carmaṇo na tantrībhyo na daṇḍānnopadhānībhyo na koṇānna puruṣasya tajjavyāyāmataḥ śabdo niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:9672: api tu khalu punaḥ sarveṣāṃ samāyogācchabdaḥ prajñapyate /
S06bsu049_u:9674: evameva kulaputra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaniṣpattirhetvadhīnā pratyayādhīnā anekakuśalamūlaprayogapariniṣpannā ca /
S06bsu049_u:9675: na caikato hetuto na caikataḥ pratyayato na caikataḥ kuśalamūlato buddhakāyaprabhāvanā /
S06bsu049_u:9679: evaṃ tvayā kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu049_u:9682: yataḥ kulaputra tvamevaṃ tathāgatāṃś ca sarvadharmāṃś ca anutpannānaniruddhāṃś ca saṃprajñāsyasi,
S06bsu049_u:9685: asmin khalu punastathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe mahān bhūmicālo 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:9686: sarvaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāramahādaśamahānimittaṃ kampate prakampate saṃprakampate,
S06bsu049_u:9692: sarvāṇi ca mārabhavanāni saṃkṣobhitāni jihmībhūtāni cābhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:9694: te sarve yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena praṇatā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:9697: śakraś ca devānāmindraścatvāraś ca mahārājāno dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ divyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran /
S06bsu049_u:9698: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:9699: tava kulaputra anubhāvena adyāsmābhiḥ paramārthanirjātā kathā deśyamānā śrutā sarvalokavipratyanīkā,
S06bsu049_u:9701: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kaḥ punaḥ kulaputra atra hetuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9702: kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya?
S06bsu049_u:9703_0: dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva āha - imaṃ kulaputra tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9703_1: tava ca pṛcchato mama ca nirdiśato 'ṣṭānāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:9705: catuḥṣaṣṭeś ca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajāṃsi vigatamalāni dharmeṣu dharmacakṣūṃṣi viśuddhāni //
S06bsu049_u:9706: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato 'bhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9707: yasya me prajñāpāramitāmimaṃ ca tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ paripṛcchataḥ iyatāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9708: etadevāsmākaṃ paryāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavedanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pariniṣpattaye /
S06bsu049_u:9709: na ca me bhūyo vicikitsā pravartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9711_0: sa tenaiva prītiprāmodyena samanvāgataḥ saptatālaṃ vihāyasamabhyudgamya saptatāle
S06bsu049_u:9711_1: sthitvā evaṃ cintayati sma - kenāhametarhi antarīkṣe sthitaḥ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9712: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhyudgataṃ dṛṣṭvā cetasaiva cāsya cittamājñāya divyāni cāsmai māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyupanāmayati sma,
S06bsu049_u:9713: evaṃ cāvocat - ebhistvaṃ kulaputra divyaiḥ puṣpairdharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ [Vaidya_256] mahāsattvaṃ satkuru /
S06bsu049_u:9715: tava hi kulaputra anubhāvena adya bahūnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9717: ye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān kalpānutsahante mahāntaṃ bhāramudvoḍhuṃ yathā tvayā utsoḍham //
S06bsu049_u:9718: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasyāntikānmāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamavākirat,
S06bsu049_u:9720: svakena ca kāyena dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhicchādayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:9721: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - eṣo 'haṃ kulaputra adyāgreṇa tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmi upasthānaparicaryāyai /
S06bsu049_u:9722: sa ātmānaṃ niryātya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvāsthāt //
S06bsu049_u:9723: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā tāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - etā vayam api kulaputra tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9724: vayamapyanena kuśalamūlena eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema,
S06bsu049_u:9725: tvayaiva ca sārdhaṃ punaḥ punarbuddhāṃś ca bhagavato bodhisattvāṃś ca satkuryāma gurukuryāma /
S06bsu049_u:9727: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāṃ tāni ca pañca dārikāśatānyetadavocat - yadi me yūyaṃ dārikā adhyāśayamanuvartadhvam,
S06bsu049_u:9730: dārikā āhuḥ - anuvartiṣyāmahe tava vayamāśayenādhyāśayena ca /
S06bsu049_u:9732_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
S06bsu049_u:9732_1: dārikāśatāni sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāni kṛtvā tāni ca pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkṛtya sarvāṇi
S06bsu049_u:9732_2: ca tāni dharmodgatāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya niryātayati sma upasthānaparicaryāyaiḥ
S06bsu049_u:9733: imāni ca pañca rathaśatāni niryātayāmi paribhogāyeti //
S06bsu049_u:9734: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasmai kulaputrāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:9736: evaṃrūpeṇa ca tyāgacittena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:9737: evaṃ ca dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca śrotum /
S06bsu049_u:9738_0: tair api kulaputra paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ
S06bsu049_u:9738_1: caradbhirevaṃrūpa eva tyāge sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9739_0: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
S06bsu049_u:9739_1: dārikāśatāni pañca rathaśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalaparipūrimupādāya pratigṛhṇīte sma /
S06bsu049_u:9741: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanāt svakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat sūryasya cāstaṃgamanakālo 'bhūt //
S06bsu049_u:9742: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - naitanmama sādhu pratirūpaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:9745: yannvahaṃ dvābhyāmeva [Vaidya_257] īryāpathābhyāṃ sthitvā sthānena caṃkrameṇa ca kālamatināmayeyam,
S06bsu049_u:9746: yāvaddharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakādgṛhānnirgato bhaviṣyati yaduta dharmasaṃprakāśanāyeti //
S06bsu049_u:9747: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sapta varṣāṇyekasamādhisamāpanna evābhūt /
S06bsu049_u:9749: sadāprarudito 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattva sapta varṣāṇi dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayan na styānamiddhamavakrāmayāmāsa /
S06bsu049_u:9753: api tu kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:9754: yannu vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattva mahāsattvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9756: taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ susiktaṃ sumṛṣṭaṃ ca kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇam,
S06bsu049_u:9757: yatra pṛthivīpradeśe dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca saṃprakāśayiṣyatīti cintayāmāsa /
S06bsu049_u:9758_0: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya
S06bsu049_u:9759: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyaṃ nirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:9760: vyutthāya ca madhyenagarasya niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:9761_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ divyaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa
S06bsu049_u:9761_1: udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayāmāsa sārdhaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9763: svakaṃ cottarāsaṅgaṃ kāyādavatārya tasyāsanasyopari prajñapayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:9764_0: atha khalu tā dārikāḥ svakasvakānuttarāsaṅgān kāyādavatārya pañcottarāsaṅgaśatāni
S06bsu049_u:9764_1: tatrāsane prajñapayāmāsuḥ atrāsane dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:9765: evaṃ tāś ca sarvā dārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanamāstīrya tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasya jātā abhūvan //
S06bsu049_u:9766: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9767: na codakaṃ samantātparyeṣamāṇo 'pi labhate, yena taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siñcet /
S06bsu049_u:9769: apyeva nāma asya sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyodakamalabhamānasya cittaṃ khidyeta,
S06bsu049_u:9774: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvā imaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam /
S06bsu049_u:9775: tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ hi pṛthivīpradeśa uddhatarajaskaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9776: mā rajodhāturito bhūpradeśāddharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāye nipatet /
S06bsu049_u:9778: varaṃ khalu punarmamāyaṃ kāya [Vaidya_258] evaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu,
S06bsu049_u:9780: api ca kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni,
S06bsu049_u:9783: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvamasiñcat /
S06bsu049_u:9784_0: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañcadārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya
S06bsu049_u:9784_1: mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni sarvāṇi tāni tīkṣṇāni śastrāṇi gṛhītvā svakasvakāni śarīrāṇi
S06bsu049_u:9785: na ca sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvamabhūt,
S06bsu049_u:9786: yatra sa māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhet kuśalamūlāntarāyakaraṇāya //
S06bsu049_u:9787: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvaddharmakāmaścāyaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9788: yāvaddṛḍhasamādānaś ca yāvanmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaś ca anapekṣaḥ kāye jīviteṣu bhogeṣu ca,
S06bsu049_u:9791: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastatsarvaṃ lohitodakaṃ divyaṃ candanodakamadhyatiṣṭhat,
S06bsu049_u:9792: samantācca tasya pṛthivīpradeśasya acintyaṃ paramodāraṃ gandhaṃ yasya divyasya candanodakasya paripūrṇam /
S06bsu049_u:9794: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:9795: sādhu te kulaputra acintyaṃ vīryam, sādhvī ca te anuttarā dharmakāmatā dharmaparīṣṭiś ca /
S06bsu049_u:9796: evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra adhyāśayena evaṃrūpeṇa vīryeṇa evaṃrūpayā ca dharmakāmatayā taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā //
S06bsu049_u:9797: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - prajñaptaṃ mayā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanam /
S06bsu049_u:9798: ayaṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaḥ susiktaḥ susaṃmṛṣṭaś ca kṛtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9801: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakireyam?
S06bsu049_u:9802: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - imāni te kulaputra pratigṛhāṇa divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi /
S06bsu049_u:9804: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakira /
S06bsu049_u:9805: sa tasmai divyaṃ khārīsahasraṃ divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇāmupanāmayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:9806: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā anyataraiḥ puṣpaistaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇamakārṣīt,
S06bsu049_u:9808: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena tataḥ samādhervyutthāya yena dharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat,
S06bsu049_u:9809: anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayāmāsa //
S06bsu049_u:9810: [Vaidya_259] atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanenaiva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratilabhate sma,
S06bsu049_u:9812: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanāyaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā /
S06bsu049_u:9837: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāniṣaṇṇasyaiva tasyāṃ belāyāṃ sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhirājo jātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9862: evaṃpramukhāni ṣaṣṭiḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇi sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratilabdhānyabhūvanniti //
S06bsu049_u:9867: sahapratilabdhānāṃ ca subhūte ṣaṣṭyāḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi,
S06bsu049_u:9869_0: vidikṣu adha ūrdhvaṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu
S06bsu049_u:9869_1: lokadhātuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtān
S06bsu049_u:9870: tadyathāpi nāma ahametarhi asminneva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau dharmaṃ deśayāmi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛto bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9873: sarvāsu ca jātiṣu na jātu buddhavirahito 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:9874: yatra yatra buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃmukhībhūtā bhavanti, tatra tatropapadyate sma /

S06bsu049_u:9877_1: paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam - ityapīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
S06bsu049_u:9878: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ pratilabdhukāmairasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
S06bsu049_u:9879: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyopadeṣṭavyoddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:9880_0: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena mahāpustake pravyaktapravyaktairakṣaraiḥ sulikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkartavyā
S06bsu049_u:9880_1: gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇaiścīvarairvādyairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9884: tatkasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvajñajñānapariniṣpattirbhaviṣyati /

S06bsu049_u:9891: tathaiva tvayā ānanda mamātyayādasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kartavyam /
